CVE-2010-0001.title: Gzip Integer Underflow in Processing LZW Compressed Archives May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0001.body: A vulnerability was reported in Gzip. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted LZW compressed gzip archive that, when unzipped by the target user, will trigger an integer underflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Aki Helin of Oulu University Secure Programming Group (OUSPG) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0001.extra: A remote user can create an archive that, when unzipped by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0010.title: Apache mod_proxy Integer Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0010.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache mod_proxy. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an integer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability resides in the ap_proxy_send_fb() function in 'modules/proxy/proxy_util.c'.Adam Zabrocki reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0010.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0018.title: Microsoft Embedded OpenType Font Engine Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0018.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Microsoft Embedded OpenType Font Engine. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Embedded OpenType (EOT) font that, when rendered via an application by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.EOT fonts can be rendered in various applications, including Microsoft Internet Explorer, Microsoft Office PowerPoint, and Microsoft Office Word.Microsoft has rated this vulnerability as 'Critical' for Microsoft Windows 2000 Service Pack 4 and 'Low' for the other affected operating systems.Tavis Ormandy of Google reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0018.extra: A remote user can create a font file that, when rendered by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0029.title: Microsoft PowerPoint Buffer Overflows and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0029.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft PowerPoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0029, CVE-2010-0030]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an invalid index array indexing flaw and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0031].A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use after free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0032].A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user via Microsoft Office PowerPoint Viewer, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0033, CVE-2010-0034].Carsten Eiram of Secunia, Sean Larsson of VeriSign iDefense Labs, SkD via TippingPoint, and Cody Pierce of TippingPoint DVLabs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-0029.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0036.title: Mac OS X CoreAudio Buffer Overflow in Playing MP4 Audio Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0036.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X CoreAudio. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MP4 audio file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Tobias Klein of trapkit.de reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0036.extra: A remote user can create an MP4 audio file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0037.title: Mac OS X Image Raw Buffer Overflow in Processing DNG Image Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0037.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Image RAW. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted DNG image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in Image RAW and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jason Carr of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0037.extra: A remote user can create a DNG image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0039.title: Apple Time Capsule and AirPort Base Station Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service or Access Ostensibly Protected Hosts
CVE-2010-0039.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Time Capsule and AirPort Base Station. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can access hosts behind the device.A remote user on the local network can send a large number of IPv6 Router Advertisement (RA) and Neighbor Discovery (ND) packets to cause the target device to restart [CVE-2009-2189]. Shoichi Sakane of the KAME project, Kanai Akira of Internet Multifeed Co., Shirahata Shin and Rodney Van Meter of Keio University, and Tatuya Jinmei of Internet Systems Consortium, Inc. reported this vulnerability.If a system behind the NAT function on the device has a portmapped FTP server, a remote user on that system can query services behind the device [CVE-2010-0039]. Sabahattin Gucukoglu reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCP reply to cause the target device to stop responding to network traffic [CVE-2010-1804]. Systems configured as a bridge or configured in Network Address Translation (NAT) mode with a default host enabled are affected. Stefan R. Filipek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0039.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to restart or stop responding to network traffic.A remote user behind the deivce can access other hosts behind the device in certain cases.

CVE-2010-0040.title: Apple Safari Bugs Let Remote Users Cause Arbitrary Code to Be Executed
CVE-2010-0040.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file or HTML page that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted image with an embedded color profile can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2010-0040]. Sebastien Renaud of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted BMP image can cause the target user's browser to send portions of memory on the target user's system to the remote site [CVE-2010-0041]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk of Hispasec reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted TIFF image file can cause the target user's browser to send portions of memory on the target user's system to the remote site [CVE-2010-0042]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk of Hispasec reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted TIFF image file can trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0043]. Gus Mueller of Flying Meat reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted external URL can cause a file on the target user's system to be opened [CVE-2010-0045]. Billy Rios and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0040.extra: A remote user can create a file or web page that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or disclose memory contents.

CVE-2010-0046.title: Apple Safari WebKit Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0046.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in WebKit and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted CSS format() arguments can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0046]. Robert Swiecki of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted HTML can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0047]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.Specially crafted XML can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0048].Specially crafted HTML elements containing right-to-left displayed text can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0049]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted HTML containing nested tags can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0050]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.Specially crafted cross-origin stylesheet requests can access the content of ostensibly protected resources on another web site [CVE-2010-0051].Callbacks for specially crafted HTML elements can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0052].Specially crafted content with a CSS display property set to 'run-in' can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0053]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.Specially crafted HTML image elements can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0054].
CVE-2010-0046.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0052.title: Apple Safari WebKit Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0052.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in WebKit and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted CSS format() arguments can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0046]. Robert Swiecki of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted HTML can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0047]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.Specially crafted XML can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0048].Specially crafted HTML elements containing right-to-left displayed text can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0049]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted HTML containing nested tags can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0050]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.Specially crafted cross-origin stylesheet requests can access the content of ostensibly protected resources on another web site [CVE-2010-0051].Callbacks for specially crafted HTML elements can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0052].Specially crafted content with a CSS display property set to 'run-in' can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0053]. wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.Specially crafted HTML image elements can trigger a use-after-free error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0054].
CVE-2010-0052.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0097.title: BIND DNSSEC NSEC/NSEC3 Error May Let Remote Users Spoof NXDOMAIN Responses
CVE-2010-0097.body: A vulnerability was reported in BIND. A remote user may be able to spoof NXDOMAIN responses.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the DNSSEC NSEC/NSEC3 validation code to potentially cause invalid NXDOMAIN responses to be cached. The server may return the invalid NXDOMAIN data with the AD flag set.The vendor indicates that while cache poisoning is difficult to exploit, protection against denial-of-service attacks against a secure zone may be impaired.All DNSSEC-validating resolvers are affected.
CVE-2010-0097.extra: A remote user may be able to spoof NXDOMAIN responses.

CVE-2010-0107.title: Symantec Client Security Buffer Overflow in SYMLTCOM.dll ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code in Certain Limited Cases
CVE-2010-0107.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Client Security. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system in certain limited cases.A remote user with the ability to spoof a certain domain can create and serve specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user in the context of that domain, will invoke the 'SYMLTCOM.dll' ActiveX control and trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.VUPEN Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0107.extra: A remote user with the ability to spoof a certain domain can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0107.title: Norton Anti-Virus Buffer Overflow in SYMLTCOM.dll ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code in Certain Limited Cases
CVE-2010-0107.body: A vulnerability was reported in Norton Anti-Virus. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system in certain limited cases.A remote user with the ability to spoof a certain domain can create and serve specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user in the context of that domain, will invoke the 'SYMLTCOM.dll' ActiveX control and trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.FrSIRT reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0107.extra: A remote user with the ability to spoof a certain domain can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0107.extra: A remote user with the ability to spoof a certain domain can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.FrSIRT reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0107.extra: A remote user with the ability to spoof a certain domain can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0110.title: Symantec Antivirus Corporate Edition Intel AMS Service Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0110.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the Intel Alert Management System service on TCP port 38292 to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in the third party Intel Alert Management System(AMS2).An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint), Junaid Bohio of Vulnerability Research Team, Telus Security Labs, and Jorge Lucangeli Obes of CORE Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0110.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0111.title: Symantec Antivirus Corporate Edition Intel AMS Service Lets Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Programs
CVE-2010-0111.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can execute programs on the target user's system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the Intel Alert Management System service on TCP port 38292 to cause the target service to shutdown. It may be possible to execute arbitrary programs on the target user's system.The vulnerability resides in the third party Intel Alert Management System (AMS2).Symantec Systems Center and Symantec Quarantine Server are also affected.An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint), Junaid Bohio of Vulnerability Research Team, Telus Security Labs, and Nahuel Riva of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0111.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to shutdown.A remote user can execute programs on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0112.title: Symantec IM Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2010-0112.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec IM Manager. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The Symantec IM Manager administration console does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply specially crafted parameter values to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.
CVE-2010-0112.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2010-0114.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Validation Flaw in 'fw_charts.php' Lets Remote Users Overwrite Files and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0114.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause 'fw_charts.php' to overwrite arbitrary files on the target system that can be subsequently executed.The remote user must be on a system that has both the Symantec Endpoint (SEP) client and that is authenticated to the target SEP server.The vendor was notified on April 6, 2010.Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-0114.extra: A remote user can overwrite arbitrary files and execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0115.title: Symantec Web Gateway Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2010-0115.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Web Gateway. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The management console GUI does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.
CVE-2010-0115.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2010-0116.title: RealPlayer Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Files and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0116.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain files from the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted RealPlayer QCP file can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2010-0116]. Windows RealPlayer SP versions 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted dimensions in the YUV420 transformation of MP4 content can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0117]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted QCP data can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2010-0120]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted IVR file can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-2996]. Windows RealPlayer 11.1 and prior versions are affected. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A specially crafted FLV file can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2010-3000]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Sebastian Apelt and siberas reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A flaw in the ActiveX IE Plugin has unspecified impact [CVE-2010-3001]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Steve Manzuik of Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) reported this vulnerability.A flaw in the ActivX control allows a remote user to access files on the target user's system [CVE-2010-3002]. Windows RealPlayer 11.1 and prior versions are affected. Behrang Fouladi of SensePost reported this vulnerability.The RealPlayer Enterprise, Mac RealPlayer, Linux RealPlayer, and Helix Player are not affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-0116.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access files on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0125.title: RealPlayer Buffer Overflows and Memory Corruption Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0125.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.RealPlayer Enterprise is also affected.Nicolas Joly and Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, anonymous researchers, Sebastian Apelt, Andreas Schmidt, AbdulAziz Hariri, and Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Alin Rad Pop and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Aaron Portnoy, Zef Cekaj, and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs, Omair, iDefense Labs, and Team lollersk8erz reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-0125.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0136.title: OpenOffice VBA Macro Security Controls Can Be Bypassed
CVE-2010-0136.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice. A remote user can bypass VBA macro security controls.A remote user can create a specially crafted document that, when loaded by the target user, will execute a VBA macro with the ability to bypass macro security controls.
CVE-2010-0136.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute VBA macros on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0138.title: CiscoWorks Internetwork Performance Monitor CORBA GIOP Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0138.body: A vulnerability was reported in CiscoWorks Internetwork Performance Monitor. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted CORBA GIOP request to trigger a buffer overflow in the Internet Performance Monitor (IPM) and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.CiscoWorks IPM version 2.x for Sun Solaris and CiscoWorks IPM version 4.x for Windows and Solaris are not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsv62350 to this vulnerability.TippingPoint reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0138.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0146.title: Cisco Security Agent Management Center Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Download Files and Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2010-0146.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Management Center for Cisco Security Agents. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands. A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database and potentially modify the configuration [CVE-2010-0147]. Versions 5.1, 5.2, and 6.0 are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd73290 to this vulnerability.This can be exploited to modify the security policies of the managed endpoints and to create, delete, or modify management user accounts on the Management Center. This may also cause the the Management Center to become unstable.A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted request to view arbitrary files on target system that is running the Management Center for Cisco Security Agents [CVE-2010-0146]. Version 6.0 is affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd73275 to this vulnerability.Gabriele Giuseppini from Cigital reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-0146.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote authenticated user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2010-0147.title: Cisco Security Agent Management Center Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Download Files and Inject SQL Commands

A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd73290 to this vulnerability.This can be exploited to modify the security policies of the managed endpoints and to create, delete, or modify management user accounts on the Management Center. This may also cause the the Management Center to become unstable.A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted request to view arbitrary files on target system that is running the Management Center for Cisco Security Agents [CVE-2010-0146]. Version 6.0 is affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd73275 to this vulnerability.Gabriele Giuseppini from Cigital reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-0147.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote authenticated user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2010-0175.title: Mozilla Thunderbird nsTreeSelection and nsTreeContentView Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0175.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Thunderbird. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML-based e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free memory error in nsTreeSelection and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML-based e-mail containing '<option>' elements in an XUL tree '<optgroup>' that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a dangling pointer flaw in nsTreeContentView and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0176]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.regenrecht reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-0175.extra: A remote user can create an e-mail message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0175.title: Mozilla Firefox Use-After-Free Error in nsTreeSelection Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0175.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free memory error in nsTreeSelection and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-0175.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML-based e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free memory error in nsTreeSelection and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML-based e-mail containing '<option>' elements in an XUL tree '<optgroup>' that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a dangling pointer flaw in nsTreeContentView and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0176]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.regenrecht reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-0176.extra: A remote user can create an e-mail message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0176.title: Mozilla Firefox nsTreeContentView and nsPluginArray Dangling Pointers and Forced URL Drag and Drop Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0176.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML containing '<option>' elements in an XUL tree '<optgroup>' that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a dangling pointer flaw in nsTreeContentView and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0176]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user. regenrecht reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when reloaded by the target user, will trigger a dangling pointer flaw in the nsPluginArray window.navigator.plugins object and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2010-0177]. regenrecht reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded, may convert a target user mouse click into a drag-and-drop action. This can be exploited to load a privileged 'chrome:' URL and then execute arbitrary scripting code with chrome privileges [CVE-2010-0178]. Paul Stone reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0176.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0179.title: Mozilla Firefox Chrome Privilege Escalation Exposed via Firebug XMLHttpRequestSpy Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0179.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user on a system running Firebug, will invoke XMLHttpRequestSpy object to execute arbitrary scripting code with chrome privileges. The chrome privilege escalation vulnerability resides in Firefox but is exposed via Firebug.moz_bug_r_a4 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0179.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user on a system running Firebug, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0183.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Access Keystrokes, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-0183.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can steal the target user's keystrokes. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1200, CVE-2010-1201 (version 3.5 only), CVE-2010-1202, CVE-2010-1203, CVE-2010-1196, CVE-2010-0183, CVE-2010-1198, CVE-2010-1196, CVE-2010-1199]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create HTML with a focus() call that can change the target user's cursor focus while the target user is typing to access the target user's keystrokes [CVE-2010-1125].A remote user may be able to conduct cross-site scripting attacks by supplying a specially crafted "Content-Disposition: attachment" HTTP header value and "Content-Type: multipart" value [CVE-2010-1197]. Sites that allow users to upload arbitrary files and specify a Content-Type but rely on Content-Disposition: attachment to prevent the content from being displayed inline may be affected.Mozilla Seamonkey is affected by these vulnerabilities.Olli Pettay, Martijn Wargers, Justin Lebar, Jesse Ruderman, Ben Turner, Jonathan Kew, David Humphrey, boardraider, stedenon, Bob Clary, Igor Bukanov, Gary Kwong, Andreas Gal, David Anderson, Nils of MWR InfoSecurity, wushi of team509, Microsoft Vulnerability Research, Martin Barbella (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Michal Zalewski of Google Security Research, Ilja van Sprundel of IOActive
CVE-2010-0183.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can steal the target user's keystrokes.A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks in certain cases.

CVE-2010-0185.title: Adobe ColdFusion Discloses Solr Service Collections to Remote Users
CVE-2010-0185.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can access ColdFusion Solr collections.A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to access the ColdFusion Solr Service collections.Antero Ortiz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0185.extra: A remote user can access ColdFusion Solr collections.

CVE-2010-0187.title: Adobe Flash Player Flaw Lets Remote Users Issue Cross-Domain Requests
CVE-2010-0187.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can conduct cross-domain request attacks. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by a target user, will bypass the domain sandbox controls and issue requests to other domains [CVE-2010-0186].A remote user can also cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-0187].Adobe AIR is also affected.Michael Yong Park reported the cross-domain request vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0187.extra: A remote user can conduct cross-domain request attacks.

CVE-2010-0188.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat Unspecified Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0188.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The Microsoft Vulnerability Research Program (MSVR) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0188.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0189.title: Adobe Download Manager Flaw Lets Remote Users Download and Install Arbitrary Software
CVE-2010-0189.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Download Manager. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be installed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will download and install arbitrary code on the target system.Adobe Reader and Adobe Flash Player include the vulnerable Download Manager and are affected.Yorick Koster via iDefense and Aviv Raff reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0189.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will download and install arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0209.title: HP Systems Insight Manager Flaws Let Remote Users Modify Data, Deny Service, or Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2010-0209.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Systems Insight Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can modify data on the target system.No details were provided.
CVE-2010-0209.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can modify data on the target system.

CVE-2010-0211.title: OpenLDAP Bugs in slap_mods_free() and IA5StringNormalize() Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0211.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenLDAP. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause an invalid pointer to be freed, potentially executing arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0211]. The vulnerability resides in the slap_modrdn2mods() function in 'modrdn.c'.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a null pointer dereference and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0212]. The vulnerability resides in the IA5StringNormalize() function in 'schema_init.c'.Ilkka Mattila and Tuomas Salom.ki using the Codenomicon LDAPv3 test suite reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0211.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0212.title: OpenLDAP Bugs in slap_mods_free() and IA5StringNormalize() Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0212.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenLDAP. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause an invalid pointer to be freed, potentially executing arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0211]. The vulnerability resides in the slap_modrdn2mods() function in 'modrdn.c'.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a null pointer dereference and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-0212]. The vulnerability resides in the IA5StringNormalize() function in 'schema_init.c'.Ilkka Mattila and Tuomas Salom.ki using the Codenomicon LDAPv3 test suite reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0212.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0221.title: Kingston DataTraveler USB Flash Drive Password Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Bypass Access Controls
CVE-2010-0221.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kingston DataTraveler flash drives. A local user can bypass access controls to access files on the target device.A local user can modify a running version of the access control software to cause the password validation process to grant access to the local user. The local user can then obtain files on the target device.The following versions are affected:DataTraveler BlackBox (DTBB)The original advisory is available at:http://www.syss.de/index.php?id=108&tx_ttnews[tt_news]=528&cHash=8d16fa63d9Matthias Deeg and Sebastian Schreiber of SySS reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0221.extra: A local user can bypass access controls to access files on the target flash drive.

CVE-2010-0232.title: Windows Kernel #GP Trap Handler Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0232.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the Virtual-8086 mode implementation to bypass security controls and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The #GP trap handler (nt!KiTrap0D) allows a local user to switch the kernel stack to a user-controlled address.Some demonstration exploit code is available at:http://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/c0af0967d904cef2ad4db766a00bc6af/KiTrap0D.zipThe vendor was notified on June 12, 2009.x64-based systems are not affected.Tavis Ormandy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0232.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0234.title: Windows Kernel Flaws Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Deny Service
CVE-2010-0234.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply specially crafted registry keys to a Windows kernel system call to cause the target system to become unresponsive and automatically restart [CVE-2010-0234]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can create specially crafted symbolic links to cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0235]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can create a specially crafted symbolic-link type registry key that, when processed by the target system, will execute arbitrary code with System privileges [CVE-2010-0236]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can traverse symbolic links from untrusted to trusted hives to execute arbitrary code with System privileges [CVE-2010-0237]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can create a specially crafted registry key to cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0238]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a virtual path validation flaw to cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0481]. Tavis Ormandy of Google, Inc. reported this vulnerability.A local user can create a specially crafted image file that, when processed, will cause the target system to stop responding and restart [CVE-2010-0482]. Martin Tofall of Obsidium Software reported this vulnerability.A local user can create certain exceptions that will not be properly handled by the kernel, causing the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0810]. Tavis Ormandy of Google, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0234.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2010-0249.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Invalid Pointer Reference Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0249.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an invalid pointer reference and execute arbitrary code on the target system when the referenced (and deleted) object is accessed by the browser. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor indicates that Internet Explorer 5.01 SP4 on Microsoft Windows 2000 SP4 is not affected.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.Demonstration code is publicly available.Google, MANDIANT, Adobe, and McAfee reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: On Monday January 18, 2010 (UTC), Microsoft issued a blog post noting that attacks have been limited to a targeted subset of their customers and that the attacks have been against IE version 6: http://blogs.technet.com/msrc/archive/2010/01/17/further-insight-into-security-advisory-979352-and-the-threat-landscape.aspx]
CVE-2010-0249.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0257.title: Microsoft Office Excel Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0257.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Open XML File Format Converter for Mac is also affected.Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 is also affected.A specially crafted record can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2010-0257].A specially crafted file can trigger an object type error [CVE-2010-0258].A specially crafted MDXTUPLE record can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2010-0260].A specially crafted MDXSET record can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2010-0261]A specially crafted FNGROUPNAME record can trigger a memory initialization error [CVE-2010-0262].A specially crafted XLSX file can trigger a parsing error [CVE-2010-0263].A specially crafted DbOrParamQry record can trigger a parsing error [CVE-2010-0264].Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Sean Larsson of VeriSign iDefense Labs, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint, and Damian Frizza from Core Security Technologies reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-0257.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0267.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2010-0267.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0267]. Secunia reported this vulnerability.A race condition in accessing an object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0489].Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0490]. Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security reported this vulnerability. Ivan Fratric of iSIGHT Partners Global Vulnerability Partnership also reported this vulnerability.Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0491]. Wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via VeriSign iDefense Labs.Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0492]. Simon Zuckerbraun reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will exploit a flaw in an ActiveX control in the processing of long URLs and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0805]. The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 333C7BC4-460F-11D0-BC04-0080C7055A83. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.Accessing a deleted object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0807]. ADLab of VenusTech reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will gain access to a browser window in another domain or Internet Explorer zone on the target user's system [CVE-2010-0494]. Paul Stone of Context Information Security reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create HTML with specially encoded strings that, when loaded and submitted by the target user, will disclose information from the target user's system to the remote user [CVE-2010-0488]. Daiki Fukumori of Cyber Defense Institute Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0267.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2010-0271.title: OpenSolaris 'hald' Daemon May Fail to Write Records to the Audit Log
CVE-2010-0271.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSolaris. The system may fail to properly write audit records.A user can exploit an unspecified flaw to cause the hald(1M) daemon to fail to write audit records.Systems that have Solaris Auditing enabled are affected.
CVE-2010-0271.extra: The system may fail to properly write audit records.

CVE-2010-0283.title: Kerberos KDC Input Validation Flaw in process_as_req() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-0283.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the target KDC process to trigger a flaw in the process_as_req() process cause the target service to crash.Versions prior to krb5-1.7 are not affected.Emmanuel Bouillon (NATO C3 Agency) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0283.extra: A remote user can a KDC process to crash.

CVE-2010-0284.title: Novell Access Manager Directory Traversal Flaw Lets Remote Users Upload Arbitrary Files
CVE-2010-0284.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Access Manager. A remote user can upload files to the target system.A remote user can exploit a directory traversal flaw in the PortalModuleInstallManager component to upload arbitrary contents to arbitrary files on the Management Console.Windows-based systems are affected.Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2010-0284.extra: A remote user can upload arbitrary contents to arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2010-0296.title: GNU Glibc mntent Newline Processing Error Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0296.body: A vulnerability was reported in Glibc. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The mntent functions in the GNU C library do not properly handle newlines. A local user that can inject newlines into a mount entry or other affected mount helpers may be able to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.Jeff Layton and Dan Rosenberg reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0296.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0301.title: Maildrop Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Group Privileges
CVE-2010-0301.body: A vulnerability was reported in Maildrop. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.On systems where the mail directory does not use the sticky bit, the '-d' command switch does not properly change the group privileges. A local user can obtain root group privileges.The vulnerability resides in 'maildrop/main.C'.Christoph Anton Mitterer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0301.extra: A local user can obtain root group privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0302.title: CUPS Use After Free in cupsdDoSelect() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-0302.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The patch for CVE-2009-3553 (STR #3200) is not complete for systems that use kqueue or epoll.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a use-after-free condition in cupsdDoSelect() in 'scheduler/select.c' to cause the cupsd service to crash.Tim Waugh reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0302.extra: A remote user can cause the cupsd service to crash.

CVE-2010-0304.title: Wireshark Buffer Overflows in LWRES Dissector Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-0304.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target service to crash.Babi reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0304.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2010-0308.title: Squid Processing of Header-Only DNS Messages Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-0308.body: A vulnerability was reported in Squid. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote trusted client or external server can send specially crafted DNS packets to cause the target service to become unavailable for a short period of time.Tomas Hoger of RedHat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0308.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-0310.title: Solaris Trusted Extensions Missing Libraries Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0310.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.Certain libraries were not delivered with Solaris Trusted Extensions. A local privileged user can exploit this to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.
CVE-2010-0310.extra: A local privileged user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0312.title: IBM Tivoli Directory Server Null Pointer Dereference Lets Remote Users Crash the Server
CVE-2010-0312.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Directory Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target ibmslapd service to crash.Evgeny Legerov of Intevydis reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://intevydis.blogspot.com/2010/01/tivoli-directory-server-62-doextendedop.html
CVE-2010-0312.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2010-0317.title: NetWare CIFS and AFP Protocol Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-0317.body: A vulnerability was reported in NetWare. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a large number of specially crafted requests via CIFS or AFP to cause the target service to consume excessive memory and eventually cause the target server to crash.The following module versions are affected:CIFS.nlm Semantic Agent (Build 163 MP)Version 3.27 November 13, 2008AFPTCP.nlm Build 163 SPVersion 3.27 November 13, 2008The vendor was notified on December 21, 2009.The advisory is available at:http://protekresearch.blogspot.com/2010/01/prl-cifsnlm-memory-consumption-denial.htmlFrancis Provencher of Protek Research Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0317.extra: A remote user can cause the target server to crash.

CVE-2010-0318.title: FreeBSD ZFS Intent Log Mechanism May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0318.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information or obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The ZFS Intent Log (ZIL) replay mechanism may cause some files to be set with mode 07777 when the filesystem is stopped suddenly and then repaired. A local user may be able to access potentially sensitive information in affected files or execute affected files to gain elevated privileges.Pawel Jakub Dawidek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0318.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0357.title: IBM Lotus Web Content Management Input Validation Flaw in Login Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-0357.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Web Content Management. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The login page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Lotus Web Content Management software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned APAR PM03233 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0357.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Lotus Web Content Management software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-0358.title: IBM Lotus Domino Heap Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0358.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Domino. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP data to trigger a heap overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Evgeny Legerov from Intevydis reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://intevydis.blogspot.com/2010/01/lotus-domino-7-probably-8-ldap-heap.html
CVE-2010-0358.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0359.title: Zeus Web Server Buffer Overflow in SSL Implementation Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0359.body: A vulnerability was reported in Zeus Web Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted SSL2_CLIENT_HELLO message to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The original advisory is available at:http://intevydis.blogspot.com/2010/01/zeus-web-server-ssl2clienthello.htmlEvgeny Legerov from Intevydis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0359.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0387.title: Sun Java System Web Server Heap Overflow in Processing HTTP Digest Authentication Requests Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code
CVE-2010-0387.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Web Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted digest authentication request to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The original advisory is available at:http://intevydis.blogspot.com/2010/01/sun-java-system-web-server-70u7-digest.htmlEvgeny Legerov of Intevydis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0387.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0411.title: SystemTap Buffer Overflow in __get_argv() May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0411.body: A vulnerability was reported in SystemTap. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in __get_argv() to cause the target system to crash (if the calling script runs with root privileges) or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The __get_compat_argv() function is also affected.
CVE-2010-0411.extra: A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0419.title: KVM x86 Emulator Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges on the Guest Operating System
CVE-2010-0419.body: A vulnerability was reported in KVM. A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target guest operating system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the way the x86 emulator loads segment selectors to cause the guest operating system to crash or potentially gain elevated privileges on the guest operating system.Some guest system configurations are affected.Paolo Bonzini reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0419.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target guest operating system to crash or obtain elevated privileges on the target guest operating system.

CVE-2010-0421.title: Pango GDEF Array Indexing Error in Font Library Lets Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-0421.body: A vulnerability was reported in Pango. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote or local user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target user via an application that uses the Pango font rendering library, will trigger an array indexing error in the generation of Glyph Definition tables (GDEF) and cause the target application to crash.Marc Schoenefeld reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0421.extra: A remote or local user can create a font file that, when loaded by the target application, will cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2010-0426.title: Sudo sudoedit and 'runas_default' Flaws Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0426.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Sudo. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with privileges in the sudoers file can invoke the sudoedit pseudo-command to potentially execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges [CVE-2010-0426].Supplementary groups are not properly initialized when the sudoers file "runas_default" option is used. A local user with privileges in the sudoers file can run commands with the root user's supplementary groups privileges [CVE-2010-0427].
CVE-2010-0426.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0427.title: Sudo sudoedit and 'runas_default' Flaws Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0427.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Sudo. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with privileges in the sudoers file can invoke the sudoedit pseudo-command to potentially execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges [CVE-2010-0426].Supplementary groups are not properly initialized when the sudoers file "runas_default" option is used. A local user with privileges in the sudoers file can run commands with the root user's supplementary groups privileges [CVE-2010-0427].
CVE-2010-0427.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-0441.title: Asterisk T.38 Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-0441.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted FaxMaxDatagram value in a T.38 protocol message via SIP to cause the target service to crash.bklang and elsto at issues.asterisk.org reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0441.extra: A remote user can cause Asterisk to crash.

CVE-2010-0442.title: PostgreSQL Substring Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0442.body: A vulnerability was reported in PostgreSQL. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted SELECT substring command to trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The original advisory is available at:http://intevydis.blogspot.com/2010/01/postgresql-8023-bitsubstr-overflow.htmlEvgeny Legerov of Intevydis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0442.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0449.title: HP SOA Registry Foundation Lets Remote Users Access Data and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-0449.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP SOA Registry Foundation. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can access data on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2010-0450].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2010-0449]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP SOA Registry Foundation software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can gain read access to data on the target system [CVE-2010-0448].Marc Schoenefeld of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-0449.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP SOA Registry Foundation software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can view data on the target system.

CVE-2010-0451.title: HP-UX NFS/ONCplus Inadvertently Enables NFS
CVE-2010-0451.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP-UX. A remote user can access NFS shares on the target system.When NFS/ONCplus is running on HP-UX, NFS may be inadvertently enabled. Installing the software will set the value 'NFS_SERVER=1' in the '/etc/rc.config.d/nfsconf' configuration file.
CVE-2010-0451.extra: A remote user can access NFS shares on the target system.

CVE-2010-0452.title: HP Project and Portfolio Management Center Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-0452.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Project and Portfolio Management Center (PPMC). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Project and Portfolio Management Center software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.This product was formerly known as "Mercury IT Governance".
CVE-2010-0452.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Project and Portfolio Management Center software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-0462.title: IBM DB2 Heap Overflow in Processing SELECT Statements Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0462.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted SELECT statement to trigger a heap overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The original advisory is available at:http://intevydis.blogspot.com/2010/01/ibm-db2-97-heap-overflow.htmlEvgeny Legerov of Intevydis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0462.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-0482.title: Windows Kernel Flaws Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Deny Service
CVE-2010-0482.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply specially crafted registry keys to a Windows kernel system call to cause the target system to become unresponsive and automatically restart [CVE-2010-0234]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can create specially crafted symbolic links to cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0235]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can create a specially crafted symbolic-link type registry key that, when processed by the target system, will execute arbitrary code with System privileges [CVE-2010-0236]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can traverse symbolic links from untrusted to trusted hives to execute arbitrary code with System privileges [CVE-2010-0237]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can create a specially crafted registry key to cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0238]. Matthew 'j00ru' Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec Virustotal reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a virtual path validation flaw to cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0481]. Tavis Ormandy of Google, Inc. reported this vulnerability.A local user can create a specially crafted image file that, when processed, will cause the target system to stop responding and restart [CVE-2010-0482]. Martin Tofall of Obsidium Software reported this vulnerability.A local user can create certain exceptions that will not be properly handled by the kernel, causing the target system to stop responding [CVE-2010-0810]. Tavis Ormandy of Google, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0482.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2010-0483.title: Windows VBScript Script Engine Flaw in Processing Windows Help Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-0483.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows VBScript Script Engine. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Windows help file that, when loaded by the target user via Microsoft Internet Explorer, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted dialog box can also trigger the flaw when the target user presses the F1 (help) key.Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Vista, and Windows Server 2008 are not affected.The original advisory is available at:http://isec.pl/vulnerabilities/isec-0027-msgbox-helpfile-ie.txtMaurycy Prodeus reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0483.extra: A remote user can create a file or dialog that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-0488.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2010-0488.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0267]. Secunia reported this vulnerability.A race condition in accessing an object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0489].Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0490]. Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security reported this vulnerability. Ivan Fratric of iSIGHT Partners Global Vulnerability Partnership also reported this vulnerability.Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0491]. Wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via VeriSign iDefense Labs.Accessing a deleted or incorrectly initialized object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0492]. Simon Zuckerbraun reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will exploit a flaw in an ActiveX control in the processing of long URLs and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-0805]. The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 333C7BC4-460F-11D0-BC04-0080C7055A83. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.Accessing a deleted object can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0807]. ADLab of VenusTech reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will gain access to a browser window in another domain or Internet Explorer zone on the target user's system [CVE-2010-0494]. Paul Stone of Context Information Security reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create HTML with specially encoded strings that, when loaded and submitted by the target user, will disclose information from the target user's system to the remote user [CVE-2010-0488]. Daiki Fukumori of Cyber Defense Institute Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-0488.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.
