CVE-2010-1423.title: Sun JRE Java Deployment Toolkit Lets Remote Users Inject Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2010-1423.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun JRE. A remote user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target user's system.The Java NPAPI plugin and ActiveX control (i.e., Java Deployment Toolkit) passes user-supplied input as command parameters to Java Web Start without filtering or validating the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability affects desktop Java running in 32-bit web browsers. Server-based Java is not affected.The affected component is included in recent versions of Java Runtime Environment (JRE).Tavis Ormandy and Ruben Santamarta separately reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1423.extra: A remote user can create HTML or a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1428.title: JBoss Application Server Web Console Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2010-1428.body: A vulnerability was reported in JBoss Application Server. A remote user can bypass authentication to obtain restricted data.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to the web console to bypass authentication and access ostensibly restricted information on the target server.
CVE-2010-1428.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2010-1429.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Access Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2010-1429.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A remote user can access potentially sensitive information.A remote user can submit a specially crafted HTTP request to the JMX Console to bypass authentication and access restricted information [CVE-2010-0738].Stefano Di Paola and Giorgio Fedon of Minded Security reported this vulnerability.A bug fix included in the RHSA-2009:0348 update re-introduced the vulnerability identified in CVE-2008-3273 and originally corrected in RHSA-2008:0827. A remote user can exploit this flaw to obtain potentially sensitive information about deployed web contexts [CVE-2010-1429].
CVE-2010-1429.extra: A remote user can access potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2010-1439.title: Red Hat Network Client Tools Lets Local Users Obtain RHN Access Password
CVE-2010-1439.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Network Client Tools. A local user can obtain the Red Hat Network access password.The rhn-client-tools application sets insecure permissions on the 'loginAuth.pkl' file. A local user can access the password stored in that file that is used to authenticate to the Red Hat Network.A local user can exploit this to download packages from the Red Hat Network and manipulate package or action lists associated with the target system's profile.
CVE-2010-1439.extra: A local user can obtain the Red Hat Network access password.

CVE-2010-1447.title: PostgreSQL Flaws in Safe.pm and PL/Perl Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-1447.body: A vulnerability was reported in PostgreSQL. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in Safe.pm and PL/Perl to execute arbitrary Perl code on the target database server.Systems with PL/Perl installed and enabled are affected.
CVE-2010-1447.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary Tcl code on the target database server.

CVE-2010-1508.title: Apple QuickTime Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1508.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple QuickTime. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted movie files can trigger a heap overflow in the processing of Track header atoms [CVE-2010-1508]. Only Windows-based systems are affected.A specially crafted PICT file can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2010-3800].A specially crafted FlashPix image can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2010-3801].A specially crafted QTVR movie can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2010-3802].A specially crafted movie file can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2010-4009].Moritz Jodeit of n.runs AG (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Hossein Lotfi (s0lute) (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), Rodrigo Rubira Branco from the Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team, an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), and Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-1508.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1511.title: KDE KGet Contains File Overwrite and Directory Traversal Bugs
CVE-2010-1511.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in KDE KGet. A remote user can cause files to be downloaded to arbitrary directories on the target system. A remote user can cause certain files to be overwritten on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted 'name' attribute of the 'file' element of a metalink file. When the metalink file is downloaded, the file will be stored in a directory on the target system that is located outside of the download directory [CVE-2010-1000].When KGet displays a dialog box to allow the user to choose certain metalink file options, the file will be downloaded after a period of time without user input. The file will overwrite any existing file of the same name [CVE-2010-1511].Stefan Cornelius of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-1511.extra: A remote user can cause files to be downloaded to arbitrary directories on the target system.A remote user can cause certain files to be overwritten on the target system.

CVE-2010-1571.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express Directory Traversal Flaw Lets Remote Users View Arbitrary Files on the Target System
CVE-2010-1571.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Contact Center Express. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to the bootstrap service on TCP port 6295 to view arbitrary files on the target system.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsx76165 to this vulnerability.Cisco Customer Response Solution (CRS) versions 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x and Cisco Unified IP Interactive Voice Response (Cisco Unified IP IVR) versions 5.x, 6.x, and 7.x are also affected.
CVE-2010-1571.extra: A remote user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2010-1574.title: Cisco Industrial Ethernet 3000 Series Switch Default SNMP Credentials Let Remote Users Access the Device
CVE-2010-1574.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Industrial Ethernet 3000 Series Switch. A remote user can access the device.The device uses common hard-coded SNMP community names ("public" and "private") for both read and write SNMP access.Cisco Industrial Ethernet 3000 devices running IOS Software release 12.2(52)SE or 12.2(52)SE1 are affected.If the SNMP community names are removed, the hard-coded community names are reapplied to the running configuration when the device reloads.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtf25589 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1574.extra: A remote user can access and gain full control of the target device.

CVE-2010-1575.title: Cisco Content Services Switch HTTP and ClientCert Headers Can Be Spoofed or Modified By Remote USers
CVE-2010-1575.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Cisco Content Services Switch. A remote user may be able to spoof a target user's identity.A remote user can supply a specially crafted "ClientCert" HTTP header that will be passed on to the target endpoint [CVE-2010-1575]. On an endpoint application that relies on the target device to authenticate clients, a remote user may be able to spoof a user's identity.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCSZ04690 to this vulnerability.HTTP newline sequences are not properly interpreted [CVE-2010-1576]. A remote user can supply specially crafted newline sequences to cause the target device to fail to properly insert "ClientCert" header values.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCTA04885 to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on June 5, 2009.George D. Gal of Virtual Security Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.vsecurity.com/resources/advisory/20100702-1/
CVE-2010-1575.extra: A remote user may be able to spoof a user's identity.

CVE-2010-1576.title: Cisco Application Control Engine Newline Processing Flaw May Let Remote Users Modify HTTP Headers
CVE-2010-1576.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Application Control Engine. A remote user may be able to modify HTTP headers added by the target device.HTTP newline sequences are not properly interpreted. A remote user can supply specially crafted newline sequences to cause the target device to fail to insert the "ClientCert" header values.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCTA04885 to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on June 5, 2009.George D. Gal of Virtual Security Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.vsecurity.com/resources/advisory/20100702-1/
CVE-2010-1576.extra: A remote user may be able to modify HTTP headers added by the target device.

CVE-2010-1576.title: Cisco Content Services Switch HTTP and ClientCert Headers Can Be Spoofed or Modified By Remote USers
CVE-2010-1576.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Cisco Content Services Switch. A remote user may be able to spoof a target user's identity.A remote user can supply a specially crafted "ClientCert" HTTP header that will be passed on to the target endpoint [CVE-2010-1575]. On an endpoint application that relies on the target device to authenticate clients, a remote user may be able to spoof a user's identity.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCSZ04690 to this vulnerability.HTTP newline sequences are not properly interpreted [CVE-2010-1576]. A remote user can supply specially crafted newline sequences to cause the target device to fail to properly insert "ClientCert" header values.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCTA04885 to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on June 5, 2009.George D. Gal of Virtual Security Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.vsecurity.com/resources/advisory/20100702-1/
CVE-2010-1576.extra: A remote user may be able to spoof a user's identity.

CVE-2010-1577.title: Cisco Content Delivery System Internet Streamer Directory Traversal Flaw Discloses Files to Remote Users
CVE-2010-1577.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Content Delivery System Internet Streamer. A remote user can view files on the target system.The web server contains a directory traversal flaw. A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL request to view arbitrary files on the target Cisco Content Delivery Engine running the Internet Streamer application that are located outside of the document directory, including password files and system logs.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtd68063 to this vulnerability.BT reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1577.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system, including the password files and system logs.

CVE-2010-1622.title: Oracle Fusion Middleware Bugs Let Remote Users Access and Modify Data and Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-1622.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle Fusion Middleware. A remote user can access and modify data on the target system. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Enterprise Data Quality Installation component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2014-3576].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle JDeveloper ADF Faces component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4909].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebCenter Sites Security component to partially access and partially modify data [CVE-2010-1622].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Access Manager SSO Engine component to partially access data [CVE-2015-4912].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Identity Manager OIM Legacy UI component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4832].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebCenter Content Content Server component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4867, CVE-2015-4880].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebCenter Sites Security component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4799].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle JDeveloper ADF Faces component to partially access data [CVE-2015-4838].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Outside In Technology Outside In Filters component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-4877, CVE-2015-4878].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Outside In Technology Outside In PDF Export SDK component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-4809, CVE-2015-4811].The following researchers reported these and other Oracle product vulnerabilities:Aaron Portnoy of Exodus Intelligence; Adam Gowdiak of Security Explorations; Adam Willard of Foreground Security; Advanced Threat Research Team, Intel Security; Aleksandr Dubinsky of SyncWords; Alexey Tyurin of ERPScan; Andrea Palazzo of Truel IT; Behzad Najjarpour Jabbari of Secunia Research; Borked of the Google Security Team; Brooks Li of Trend Micro; Cihan Oncu of Biznet Bilisim A.S.; Colm O hEigeartaigh; Dan Peled; David Byrne of Trustwave SpiderLabs; David Litchfield of Google; Egor Karbutov of ERPScan; Erlend Oftedal; FortiGuard Labs of Fortinet, Inc.; Francis Provencher from COSIG; Francois Goichon of Context Information Security; G. Geshev from MWR Labs; Gregory Golds; Guido Vranken; Ivan Chalykin of ERPScan; Jacob Smith; Jakub Palaczynski from ING Services Polska; Jeff Kayser of Jibe Consulting; Kana Toko; Khai Tran of Netspi; Leopold von Niebelschuetz-Godlewski of Trustwave; Marcin Gebarowski; Nikita Kelesis of ERPScan; Osanda Malith Jayathissa; Oscar Andersson; Red Hat Product Security; Sergey Gorbaty of Salesforce.com; Travis Emmert of Salesforce.com; and Ugur Cihan Koc of Avea Iletisim Hizmetleri A.S.
CVE-2010-1622.extra: A remote user can obtain data on the target system.A remote user can modify data on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-1626.title: MySQL mi_delete_table() Symlink Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Delete Data and Index Files
CVE-2010-1626.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A remote authenticated user can remove data and index files.A remote authenticated user can issue a specially crafted DROP TABLE command on one MyISAM table to remove data and index files for a different MyISAM table.This vulnerability was originally reported in 2008 in the following bug report:http://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=40980Ingo Struwing reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1626.extra: A remote authenticated user can remove data and index files.

CVE-2010-1632.title: HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) PLAT Lets Remote Users View Files and Deny Service
CVE-2010-1632.body: A vulnerability was reported in HPE Intelligent Management Center (iMC) PLAT. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can obtain files on the target system.Systems running Apache Axis2 are affected.
CVE-2010-1632.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain files on the target system.

CVE-2010-1646.title: Sudo Error in Processing Duplicate Environment Variables Lets Local Users Bypass Access Controls
CVE-2010-1646.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sudo. A local user can bypass certain command execution restrictions.The software does not handle duplicated environment variables properly.A local user with privileges to run sudo commands can set specially crafted environment variables to bypass the secure_path restrictions and execute arbitrary commands.Anders Kaseorg and Evan Broder of Ksplice, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1646.extra: A local user can bypass certain command execution restrictions.

CVE-2010-1676.title: Tor Heap Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1676.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tor. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap overflow and cause the target system to crash. It may be possible to execute arbitrary code on the target system. However, code execution has not been confirmed.Willem Pinckaers reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1676.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-1681.title: Microsoft Office Visio Buffer Overflow in Processing DXF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1681.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office Visio. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Office Visio DXF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in 'VISIODWG.DLL' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Daniel Kazimirow from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1681.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1689.title: Windows SMTP Service Uses Predictable Transaction IDs and Fails to Validate Response IDs Which May Permit DNS Spoofing
CVE-2010-1689.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Windows SMTP Service. A remote user can spoof DNS responses.The DNS queries generated by the Windows SMTP Service use predictable values for the transaction ID field [CVE-2010-1689].The Windows SMTP Service does not validate that the ID field of a received DNS response matches the value provided in the original query [CVE-2010-1690].A remote user can exploit these flaws to spoof DNS responses and poison the DNS cache on the target system.Microsoft Exchange is affected by these vulnerabilities.Nicolas Economou reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-1689.extra: A remote user can spoof DNS responses.

CVE-2010-1690.title: Windows SMTP Service Uses Predictable Transaction IDs and Fails to Validate Response IDs Which May Permit DNS Spoofing
CVE-2010-1690.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Windows SMTP Service. A remote user can spoof DNS responses.The DNS queries generated by the Windows SMTP Service use predictable values for the transaction ID field [CVE-2010-1689].The Windows SMTP Service does not validate that the ID field of a received DNS response matches the value provided in the original query [CVE-2010-1690].A remote user can exploit these flaws to spoof DNS responses and poison the DNS cache on the target system.Microsoft Exchange is affected by these vulnerabilities.Nicolas Economou reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-1690.extra: A remote user can spoof DNS responses.

CVE-2010-1749.title: Apple Safari Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Access Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2010-1749.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or other content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system or disclose potentially sensitive information.Andrzej Dyjak, Abhishek Arya of Google, Inc., Borja Marcos of Sarenet, Eric Seidel of Google, Inc., Paul Stone of Context Information Security, Masahiro Yamada, Matthieu Bonetti of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Ralf Philipp Weinmann (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Eduardo Vela Nava (sirdarckcat) of Google Inc., Gianni "gf3" Chiappetta of Runlevel6, regenrecht (via iDefense), Ojan Vafai of Google Inc., Colin Percival of Tarsnap, Dave Bowker of davebowker.com, Aki Helin of OUSPG, Chris Evans of Google Inc., Sergey Glazunov, kuzzcc, Skylined of Google Chrome Security Team, Mark Dowd of Azimuth Security, Michal Zalewski of Google, Inc., Yaar Schnitman of Google Inc., James Robinson of Google Inc., Eduardo Vela Nava (sirdarckcat) of Google Inc., Marc Worrell of WhatWebWhat, wushi of team509 (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), and Apple reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-1749.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or access information on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1794.title: Mac OS X WebDAV Memory Allocation Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-1794.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can invoke the WebDAV kernel extension and trigger a memory allocation error in the webdav_mount() function to cause a kernel panic.The vendor has been notified.Dan Rosenberg reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1794.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2010-1800.title: Mac OS X Bugs Let Remote Users Intercept TLS/SSL Connections, Impersonate Domain Names, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1800.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can intercept TLS/SSL connections. A remote user can impersonate certain domain names.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in CoreGraphics and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1801].Rodrigo Rubira Branco from the Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT) reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a document containing a specially crafted embedded font that, when viewed or downloaded, will trigger a stack overflow in Apple Type Services and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1808].A remote user with the ability to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks can redirect and intercept TLS/SSL connections to obtain user authentication credentials and potentially sensitive information [CVE-2010-1800]. Version prior to 10.6.3 are not affected. The Apple Mail application is not affected.Tomas Bjurman of Sirius IT, Jean-Luc Giraud of Citrix, and Aaron Sigel of vtty.com reported this vulnerability.A remote user with the ability to obtain a domain name similar to the target domain name, differing only in the last characters of the name, can impersonate hosts in the target domain [CVE-2010-1802].Peter Speck reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1800.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can intercept TLS/SSL connection.A remote user can impersonate certain domain names.

CVE-2010-1828.title: Mac OS X Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Deny Service, and Obtain Information
CVE-2010-1828.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote or remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target AFP Server to shutdown [CVE-2010-1828].A remote authenticated user can exploit a directory traversal flaw to create files and cause arbitrary code execution [CVE-2010-1829].A remote user can determine the existence of an AFP share [CVE-2010-1830].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in AppKit [CVE-2010-1842]. Jesse Ruderman of Mozilla Corporation reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted font, document, disk image, or web page that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-1811, CVE-2010-1831, CVE-2010-1832, CVE-2010-1833, CVE-2010-1797, CVE-2010-1752, CVE-2010-1834, CVE-2010-1836, CVE-2010-1837, CVE-2010-1841, CVE-2010-1844, CVE-2010-1845, CVE-2010-1846, CVE-2010-3785, CVE-2010-3786, CVE-2010-3798].Marc Schoenefeld of Red Hat, Christoph Diehl of Mozilla, Matias Eissler and Anibal Sacco of Core Security Technologies, Laurent OUDOT of TEHTRI-Security, Neil Fryer of IT Security Geeks, Andrew Kiss, Tobias Klein via iDefense VCP, Steven Fisher of Discovery Software Ltd., and Dominic Chell of NGSSoftware reported these vulnerabilities.A local user can bypass the Directory Service password validation and login to a mobile account [CVE-2010-1838].A remote user can trigger a stack buffer overflow in Directory Services in the validation of password data to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-1840]. Rodrigo Rubira Branco from Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT) and Rainer Mueller reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in diskdev_cmds to prevent the system from starting properly [CVE-2010-0105]. Maksymilian Arciemowicz of SecurityReason reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in the handling of terminal devices to trigger a memory management error and cause the system to shutdown [CVE-2010-1847].A remote user can send specially crafted Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) packets to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target system to shutdown [CVE-2010-1843]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote attacker can login with an outdated password due to a Password Server replication flaw [CVE-2010-3783].A remote user can send specially crafted XML data to applications using the PMPageFormatCreateWithDataRepresentation API to trigger a null dereference and cause the target application to crash [CVE-2010-3784]. Wujun Li of Microsoft reported this vulnerability.A remote attacker can access a target user's Time Machine information [CVE-2010-1803].A remote user that can edit wiki pages can inject javascript to obtain the credentials of a target user [CVE-2010-3797].
CVE-2010-1828.extra: A remote user or remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can login to a mobile account.A remote user can obtain Time Machine information.A remote user can obtain a target user's Wiki Server credentials.

Jesse Ruderman of Mozilla Corporation reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted font, document, disk image, or web page that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-1811, CVE-2010-1831, CVE-2010-1832, CVE-2010-1833, CVE-2010-1797, CVE-2010-1752, CVE-2010-1834, CVE-2010-1836, CVE-2010-1837, CVE-2010-1841, CVE-2010-1844, CVE-2010-1845, CVE-2010-1846, CVE-2010-3785, CVE-2010-3786, CVE-2010-3798].Marc Schoenefeld of Red Hat, Christoph Diehl of Mozilla, Matias Eissler and Anibal Sacco of Core Security Technologies, Laurent OUDOT of TEHTRI-Security, Neil Fryer of IT Security Geeks, Andrew Kiss, Tobias Klein via iDefense VCP, Steven Fisher of Discovery Software Ltd., and Dominic Chell of NGSSoftware reported these vulnerabilities.A local user can bypass the Directory Service password validation and login to a mobile account [CVE-2010-1838].A remote user can trigger a stack buffer overflow in Directory Services in the validation of password data to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-1840]. Rodrigo Rubira Branco from Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT) and Rainer Mueller reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in diskdev_cmds to prevent the system from starting properly [CVE-2010-0105]. Maksymilian Arciemowicz of SecurityReason reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in the handling of terminal devices to trigger a memory management error and cause the system to shutdown [CVE-2010-1847].A remote user can send specially crafted Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) packets to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target system to shutdown [CVE-2010-1843]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote attacker can login with an outdated password due to a Password Server replication flaw [CVE-2010-3783].A remote user can send specially crafted XML data to applications using the PMPageFormatCreateWithDataRepresentation API to trigger a null dereference and cause the target application to crash [CVE-2010-3784]. Wujun Li of Microsoft reported this vulnerability.A remote attacker can access a target user's Time Machine information [CVE-2010-1803].A remote user that can edit wiki pages can inject javascript to obtain the credentials of a target user [CVE-2010-3797].
CVE-2010-1847.extra: A remote user or remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can login to a mobile account.A remote user can obtain Time Machine information.A remote user can obtain a target user's Wiki Server credentials.

CVE-2010-1848.title: MySQL COM_FIELD_LIST Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-1848.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target database.The server does not properly validate the table name argument of a COM_FIELD_LIST command packet. A remote authenticated user with SELECT privileges on one table can obtain the field definitions of arbitrary tables from arbitrary databases on the target system.In version 5.1, a remote authenticated user with DELECT or SELECT privileges on one table can delete or read content of any arbitrary tables from arbitrary databases on the target system.
CVE-2010-1848.extra: A remote authenticated user with certain privileges can access or modify data from other databases on the target system.

CVE-2010-1850.title: MySQL COM_FIELD_LIST Packet Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1850.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a COM_FIELD_LIST command packet with a specially crafted table name argument to trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2010-1850.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-1869.title: Ghostscript Stack Overflow in Parser Function Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1869.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ghostscript. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in a parser function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Rodrigo Rubira Branco from the Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1869.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1871.title: JBoss Seam Input Validation Flaw in Processing JBoss Expression Language Expressions Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1871.body: A vulnerability was reported in JBoss Seam. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML containing specially crafted parametrized JBoss Expression Language (EL) expressions that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Meder Kydyraliev of the Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1871.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1885.title: Microsoft Help and Support Center URL Escaping Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2010-1885.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Help and Support Center. A remote user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target user's system.The MPC::HTML::UrlUnescapeW() function does not properly handle certain error conditions. A remote user can create a specially crafted 'hcp://' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.This vulnerability is being actively exploited in limited, targeted attacks.Tavis Ormandy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1885.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1904.title: RSA Key Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2010-1904.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Key Manager. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied meta data. A user with access to encrypted RSA Key Manager data can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database. This can be exploited to modify existing keys, remove keys, and add new keys.Systems with Key Manager client memory cache and/or file cache enabled are affected.The vendor was notified on April 20, 2010.Kyle Quest reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1904.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2010-1904.title: RSA Key Manager C Client Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2010-1904.body: A vulnerability was reported in the RSA Key Manager C Client. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user with access to encrypted data can execute SQL commands on the underlying database and modify the RSA Key Manager (RKM) C Client 1.5 cache.The vendor reports that the resulting impact may lead to data unavailability, such as decryption failure of data encrypted by the modified key.
CVE-2010-1904.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2010-1929.title: Novell iManager Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1929.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Novell iManager. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted class name value when creating a new schema class to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1929]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the login page to trigger an off-by-one error and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2010-1930].The vendor was notified on April 8, 2010.Francisco Falcon from Core Security Technologies reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-1929.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-1930.title: Novell iManager Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1930.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Novell iManager. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted class name value when creating a new schema class to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1929]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the login page to trigger an off-by-one error and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2010-1930].The vendor was notified on April 8, 2010.Francisco Falcon from Core Security Technologies reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-1930.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-1932.title: XnView Heap Overflow in Processing MBM Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1932.body: A vulnerability was reported in XnView. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MBM file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 27, 2010.Mauro Olea and Nahuel Riva from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1932.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1938.title: OPIE Off-by-One Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-1938.body: A vulnerability was reported in OPIE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to an application that uses OPIE for authentication to trigger an off-by-one buffer overflow and cause the target application to crash.It is possible that a remote user may be able to exploit this to execute arbitrary code.Maksymilian Arciemowicz and Adam Zabrocki reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1938.extra: A remote user can the target application that uses OPIE to crash.

CVE-2010-1938.title: OPIE Off-by-One Overflow in 'opielogin' Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-1938.body: A vulnerability was reported in OPIE. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger an off-by-one overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.Sebastian Krahmer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1938.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-1939.title: Apple Safari Popup Window Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1939.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://h07.w.interia.pl/Safari.rarKrystian Kloskowski (h07) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-1939.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-1960.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager 'jovgraph.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1960.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted unrecognized option to 'jovgraph.exe' to trigger a flaw in 'ovwebsnmpsrv.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1960]. The code will run with the privileges of the target web service.A remote user can send specially crafted values to 'jovgraph.exe' to trigger a flaw in 'ovutil.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1961]. The code will run with the privileges of the target web service.A remote user can send specially crafted values to 'jovgraph.exe' to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1964].The vendor was notified on February 2, 2010.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2010-1960.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-1961.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager 'jovgraph.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-1961.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted unrecognized option to 'jovgraph.exe' to trigger a flaw in 'ovwebsnmpsrv.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1960]. The code will run with the privileges of the target web service.A remote user can send specially crafted values to 'jovgraph.exe' to trigger a flaw in 'ovutil.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1961]. The code will run with the privileges of the target web service.A remote user can send specially crafted values to 'jovgraph.exe' to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-1964].The vendor was notified on February 2, 2010.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2010-1961.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-1968.title: HP Insight Software Installer Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks and Local Users Gain Unauthorized Access to Data
CVE-2010-1968.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP Insight Software Installer for Windows. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A local user can gain unauthorized access to data.No details were provided.
CVE-2010-1968.extra: A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A local user can gain unauthorized access to data.

CVE-2010-1969.title: HP Virtual Connect Enterprise Manager Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-1969.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Virtual Connect Enterprise Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Virtual Connect Enterprise Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2010-1969.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Virtual Connect Enterprise Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-1971.title: HP Insight Control Server Migration for Windows Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks and Local Users Gain Unauthorized Access to Data
CVE-2010-1971.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Insight Control Server Migration for Windows. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A local user can gain unauthorized access to data.No details were provided.
CVE-2010-1971.extra: A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A local user can gain unauthorized access to data.

CVE-2010-2020.title: FreeBSD Parameter Validation Flaw in nfsclient Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-2020.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD nfsclient. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user with privileges to mount filesystems can provide a specially crafted parameter to execute arbitrary code on the target system with kernel level privileges.Patroklos Argyroudis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2020.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary code with kernel level privileges.

CVE-2010-2022.title: FreeBSD jail() Lets Local Users Access Restricted Files
CVE-2010-2022.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD jail(8) function call. A local user can access certain restricted files on the target system.The jail(8) utility does not change the current working directory while imprisoning a process. A local user within a jail can access the current working directory of the process that made the jail() call.Aaron D. Gifford reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2022.extra: A local user can obtain files that are ostensibly restricted by the jail() call.

CVE-2010-2063.title: Samba SMB1 Packet Chaining Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2063.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted packet to trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Versions 3.4.0 and later are not affected.Jun Mao of iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2063.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2068.title: Apache mod_proxy_http May Return Results for a Different Request
CVE-2010-2068.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache mod_proxy_http. A remote user may obtain the results for a different request.Under certain timeout conditions, the server may return a response intended for another user.Only Windows, Netware, and OS2 operating systems are affected.Configurations that trigger the use of proxy worker pools are affected.Loren Anderson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2068.extra: A remote user may obtain the results for a different request for a different user.

CVE-2010-2074.title: w3m NULL Character Flaw in Common Name Field Lets Remote Users Spoof Certificates
CVE-2010-2074.body: A vulnerability was reported in w3m. A remote user can spoof certificates of arbitrary sites.A remote user can create a certificate with a specially crafted Common Name or Subject Alternative Name field that contains a NULL character. Once the certificate is signed by a Certificate Authority, the certificate can be used to spoof a target site's certificate.
CVE-2010-2074.extra: A remote user can spoof certificates of arbitrary sites.

CVE-2010-2115.title: SolarWinds TFTP Server Read Request Processing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-2115.body: A vulnerability was reported in SolarWinds TFTP Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted read request to cause the target service to stop accepting connections.A manual restart is required to return the server to normal operations.Nullthreat reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/12683
CVE-2010-2115.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to stop accepting connections.

CVE-2010-2156.title: ISC DHCP Zero Length Client ID Processing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-2156.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC DHCP. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted request containing a zero-length client ID value to cause the target service to exit.
CVE-2010-2156.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to exit.

CVE-2010-2160.title: Adobe AIR Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, and Deny Service
CVE-2010-2160.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe AIR. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Various memory corruption, buffer overflows, use-after-free memory access, pointer errors, indexing errors, and memory exhaustion flaws permit arbitrary code execution [CVE-2009-3793, CVE-2010-2160, CVE-2010-2161, CVE-2010-2162, CVE-2010-2163, CVE-2010-2164, CVE-2010-2165, CVE-2010-2166, CVE-2010-2167, CVE-2010-2169, CVE-2010-2170, CVE-2010-2171, CVE-2010-2173, CVE-2010-2174, CVE-2010-2175, CVE-2010-2176, CVE-2010-2177, CVE-2010-2178, CVE-2010-2180, CVE-2010-2181, CVE-2010-2182, CVE-2010-2183, CVE-2010-2184, CVE-2010-2185, CVE-2010-2187, CVE-2010-2188].A denial of service flaw may be able to be leveraged to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-2186].A memory corruption flaw on VMware systems with VMware Tools enabled can allow code execution [CVE-2010-2189].A denial of service flaw exists [CVE-2008-4546].A URL parsing error can permit cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2010-2179], affecting Firefox and Chrome browsers.Will Dormann of CERT, Ralph Loader of Innaworks Development Limited, an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Dionysus Blazakis (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via iDefense's Vulnerability Contributor Program), Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Megumi Yanagishita of Palo Alto Networks Inc., Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Manuel Caballero and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR), Tielei Wang from ICST-ERCIS (Engineering Research Center of Info Security, Institute of Computer Science & Technology, Peking University/China), Red Hat Security Response Team, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Ezio Anselmo Mazarim Fernandes, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, and Tavis Ormandy of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2160.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-2160.title: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, and Deny Service
CVE-2010-2160.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Various memory corruption, buffer overflows, use-after-free memory access, pointer errors, indexing errors, and memory exhaustion flaws permit arbitrary code execution [CVE-2009-3793, CVE-2010-2160, CVE-2010-2161, CVE-2010-2162, CVE-2010-2163, CVE-2010-2164, CVE-2010-2165, CVE-2010-2166, CVE-2010-2167, CVE-2010-2169, CVE-2010-2170, CVE-2010-2171, CVE-2010-2173, CVE-2010-2174, CVE-2010-2175, CVE-2010-2176, CVE-2010-2177, CVE-2010-2178, CVE-2010-2180, CVE-2010-2181, CVE-2010-2182, CVE-2010-2183, CVE-2010-2184, CVE-2010-2185, CVE-2010-2187, CVE-2010-2188].A denial of service flaw may be able to be leveraged to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-2186].A memory corruption flaw on VMware systems with VMware Tools enabled can allow code execution [CVE-2010-2189].A denial of service flaw exists [CVE-2008-4546].A URL parsing error can permit cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2010-2179], affecting Firefox and Chrome browsers.Flash Player 9 on some UNIX platforms allows denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-2172].Will Dormann of CERT, Ralph Loader of Innaworks Development Limited, an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Dionysus Blazakis (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via iDefense's Vulnerability Contributor Program), Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Megumi Yanagishita of Palo Alto Networks Inc., Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Manuel Caballero and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR), Tielei Wang from ICST-ERCIS (Engineering Research Center of Info Security, Institute of Computer Science & Technology, Peking University/China), Red Hat Security Response Team, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Ezio Anselmo Mazarim Fernandes, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, and Tavis Ormandy of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2160.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-2161.title: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, and Deny Service
CVE-2010-2161.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Various memory corruption, buffer overflows, use-after-free memory access, pointer errors, indexing errors, and memory exhaustion flaws permit arbitrary code execution [CVE-2009-3793, CVE-2010-2160, CVE-2010-2161, CVE-2010-2162, CVE-2010-2163, CVE-2010-2164, CVE-2010-2165, CVE-2010-2166, CVE-2010-2167, CVE-2010-2169, CVE-2010-2170, CVE-2010-2171, CVE-2010-2173, CVE-2010-2174, CVE-2010-2175, CVE-2010-2176, CVE-2010-2177, CVE-2010-2178, CVE-2010-2180, CVE-2010-2181, CVE-2010-2182, CVE-2010-2183, CVE-2010-2184, CVE-2010-2185, CVE-2010-2187, CVE-2010-2188].A denial of service flaw may be able to be leveraged to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-2186].A memory corruption flaw on VMware systems with VMware Tools enabled can allow code execution [CVE-2010-2189].A denial of service flaw exists [CVE-2008-4546].A URL parsing error can permit cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2010-2179], affecting Firefox and Chrome browsers.Flash Player 9 on some UNIX platforms allows denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-2172].Will Dormann of CERT, Ralph Loader of Innaworks Development Limited, an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Dionysus Blazakis (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via iDefense's Vulnerability Contributor Program), Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Megumi Yanagishita of Palo Alto Networks Inc., Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Manuel Caballero and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR), Tielei Wang from ICST-ERCIS (Engineering Research Center of Info Security, Institute of Computer Science & Technology, Peking University/China), Red Hat Security Response Team, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Ezio Anselmo Mazarim Fernandes, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, and Tavis Ormandy of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2161.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-2161.title: Adobe AIR Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, and Deny Service
CVE-2010-2161.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe AIR. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. CVE-2010-2168.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A social engineering attack can lead to code execution [CVE-2010-1240].Several invalid pointer flaws can cause code execution [CVE-2010-1285, CVE-2010-2168, CVE-2010-2201].Several memory corruption flaws can cause code execution [CVE-2010-1295, CVE-2010-2202, CVE-2010-2207, CVE-2010-2209, CVE-2010-2210, CVE-2010-2211, CVE-2010-2212].A memory corruption flaw affecting only UNIX-based systems can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2203].A remote user can cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-2204].An uninitialized memory flaw can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2205].An array-indexing error can cause [CVE-2010-2206].A deleted heap object deference flaw can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2208].Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR), Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Didier Stevens, Philippe Lagadec of NATO C3 Agency, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, James Quirk of Los Alamos, New Mexico, Gjoko Krstic of Zero Science Lab, Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, and Tavis Ormandy of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
