CVE-2010-2221.title: iSCSI Enterprise Target Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2221.body: A vulnerability was reported in iSCSI Enterprise Target. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted Internet Storage Name Service (iSNS) requests to trigger a stack overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target tgtd daemon.The vendor was notified on May 18, 2010.The Vulnerability Research Team at TELUS Security Labs reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: Several buffer overflows exist.]
CVE-2010-2221.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2223.title: Red Hat Virtual Desktop Server Manager Lets Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information From Deleted Virtual Machines
CVE-2010-2223.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Virtual Desktop Server Manager. A local user (guest user) can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local guest user in a new, raw virtual machine (VM) can read limited data from deleted VMs in that data domain.
CVE-2010-2223.extra: A local guest user can obtain potentially sensitive information from certain deleted virtual machines.

CVE-2010-2227.title: Apache Tomcat 'Transfer-Encoding' Header Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2010-2227.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tomcat. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send a request with a specially crafted 'Transfer-Encoding' header value to trigger a buffer recycling error and cause subsequent requests to fail or cause information from other requests to be leaked to the user.Steve Jones reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2227.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can obtain information from other requests.

CVE-2010-2233.title: LibTIFF Incorrect Image Flipping Computation Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2233.body: A vulnerability was reported in LibTIFF. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image that, when vertically flipped by the target user or application, will write to out-of-bounds memory locations and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vulnerability resides in 'tif_getimage.c'.Only 64-bit systems are affected.
CVE-2010-2233.extra: A remote user can create an image that, when flipped by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2240.title: Linux Kernel Stack Memory Management Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2010-2240.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the X server (for example) to exhaust or fragment its memory space and then overwrite other memory mapped areas to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.The original advisory is available at:http://www.invisiblethingslab.com/resources/misc-2010/xorg-large-memory-attacks.pdfRafal Wojtczuk of Invisible Things Lab (ITL) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2240.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-2241.title: Red Hat Directory Server Weak File Permissions Lets Local Users Obtain Administrative Passwords
CVE-2010-2241.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A local user can obtain administrative passwords.The Directory Server setup scripts (setup-ds.pl and setup-ds-admin.pl) cache certain files containing the Directory and Administration Server administrative account passwords with unsafe permissions. A local user can access the files to obtain the authentication credentials for those administrative accounts.
CVE-2010-2241.extra: A local user can obtain administrative passwords.

CVE-2010-2248.title: Linux Kernel Flaw in CIFS CIFSSMBWrite() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-2248.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote server can send a specially crafted SMB packet in response to a connected client to trigger a flaw in the CIFSSMBWrite() function to trigger a kernel panic on the target system.
CVE-2010-2248.extra: A remote user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2010-2264.title: Apple Safari Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Access Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2010-2264.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or other content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system or disclose potentially sensitive information.Andrzej Dyjak, Abhishek Arya of Google, Inc., Borja Marcos of Sarenet, Eric Seidel of Google, Inc., Paul Stone of Context Information Security, Masahiro Yamada, Matthieu Bonetti of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Ralf Philipp Weinmann (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Eduardo Vela Nava (sirdarckcat) of Google Inc., Gianni "gf3" Chiappetta of Runlevel6, regenrecht (via iDefense), Ojan Vafai of Google Inc., Colin Percival of Tarsnap, Dave Bowker of davebowker.com, Aki Helin of OUSPG, Chris Evans of Google Inc., Sergey Glazunov, kuzzcc, Skylined of Google Chrome Security Team, Mark Dowd of Azimuth Security, Michal Zalewski of Google, Inc., Yaar Schnitman of Google Inc., James Robinson of Google Inc., Eduardo Vela Nava (sirdarckcat) of Google Inc., Marc Worrell of WhatWebWhat, wushi of team509 (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), and Apple reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2264.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or access information on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2288.title: Juniper Secure Access Input Validation Holes Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-2288.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Secure Access (IVE). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target authenticated user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the web interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on October 12, 2009.Richard Brain of ProCheckUp Ltd (www.procheckup.com) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2288.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-2290.title: McAfee UTM Firewall Input Validation Flaw in Help Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-2290.body: A vulnerability was reported in McAfee UTM Firewall. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The management console help feature does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by an authenticated target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the McAfee UTM Firewall device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The remote user must know the internal IP address for the target UTM device.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:The vendor was notified on January 21, 2010.The original advisory is available at:http://ngenuity-is.com/advisories/2010/jun/9/mcafee-utm-firewall-help-cross-site-scripting/Adam Baldwin of Ngenuity Information Services reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2290.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the McAfee UTM Firewall device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-2337.title: RSA Federated Identity Manager URL Redirection Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2010-2337.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Federated Identity Manager. A remote user can bypass certain security restrictions.A remote authenticated user can exploit a URL redirection flaw to bypass unspecified security restrictions.No details were provided.
CVE-2010-2337.extra: A remote user can bypass security controls.

CVE-2010-2347.title: SAP J2EE Engine Telnet Interface Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Some Administrative Access Controls
CVE-2010-2347.body: A vulnerability was reported in the SAP J2EE Engine. A remote authenticated user can bypass some administrative access controls.A remote authenticated user can exploit the engine's Telnet interface to conduct SMB relay attacks and access some administration functions.The vendor was notified on November 24, 2009.Mariano Nunez Di Croce from Onapsis Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2347.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass some administrative access controls.

CVE-2010-2427.title: VMware Studio Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Commands and Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-2427.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware Studio. A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Virtual Appliance Management Infrastructure (VAMI) to cause arbitrary commands to be executed by the target user in Studio 2.0 [CVE-2010-2667]. Virtual appliances created with VMware Studio 2.0 are also affected. The default configuration (in which there are no user accounts except for a root user account) is not affected.A local user can exploit a flaw in the processing of temporary files to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2010-2427]. The default configuration (in which there are no user accounts except for a root user account) is not affected. Virtual appliances created with Studio 2.0 are not affected.Claudio Criscione of Secure Network reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2427.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed.A local user can obtain elevated privileges.

CVE-2010-2498.title: FreeType 2 Font File Processing Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2498.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeType 2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target application, will trigger a buffer overflow or other memory management or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.An invalid memory management error in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2498].An integer overflow in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2500].Buffer overflows in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2499, CVE-2010-2519].Buffer overflows in the FreeType demo applications can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2527, CVE-2010-2541].Robert Swiecki of the Google Security Team reported several of these vulnerabilities. Marek Kasik reported one of the demo application vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2498.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2500.title: FreeType 2 Font File Processing Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2500.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeType 2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target application, will trigger a buffer overflow or other memory management or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.An invalid memory management error in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2498].An integer overflow in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2500].Buffer overflows in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2499, CVE-2010-2519].Buffer overflows in the FreeType demo applications can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2527, CVE-2010-2541].Robert Swiecki of the Google Security Team reported several of these vulnerabilities. Marek Kasik reported one of the demo application vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2500.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2519.title: FreeType 2 Font File Processing Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2519.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeType 2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target application, will trigger a buffer overflow or other memory management or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.An invalid memory management error in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2498].An integer overflow in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2500].Buffer overflows in the FreeType font engine can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2499, CVE-2010-2519].Buffer overflows in the FreeType demo applications can cause code execution [CVE-2010-2527, CVE-2010-2541].Robert Swiecki of the Google Security Team reported several of these vulnerabilities. Marek Kasik reported one of the demo application vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2519.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2521.title: Linux Kernel NFS Server-Side XDR Buffer Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2521.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A remote user on the local network may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user on the local network can send a specially crafted large compound request to the target NFSv4 server to trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2010-2521.extra: A remote user on the local network may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2526.title: LVM2 Missing Authentication in Cluster Local Volume Manager Lets Local Users Manage Volumes in the Cluster
CVE-2010-2526.body: A vulnerability was reported in LVM2. A local user can manage volumes in the cluster.The cluster logical volume manager daemon (clvmd) does not verify the credentials of clients connecting to its control UNIX abstract socket. A local user can send control commands to clvmd to activate, deactivate, or reload any logical volume on the target system or on another system in the cluster.Alasdair Kergon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2526.extra: A local user can activate, deactivate, or reload any logical volume on the target system or on another system in the cluster.

CVE-2010-2547.title: GnuPG GPGSM Tool Certificate Import Memory Error May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2547.body: A vulnerability was reported in the GnuPG GPGSM tool. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted certificate that, when imported by the target user via the GPGSM import command, will trigger a memory reallocation error and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.A certificate with more than 98 Subject Alternate Names can trigger the flaw.Peter Gutmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2547.extra: A remote user can create a certificate that, when imported by the target user, will potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2568.title: Microsoft Windows Shell LNK Shortcut Processing Flaw Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2568.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows Shell. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system in certain cases.A remote user can create specially crafted LNK (shortcut) file that, when the link icon is viewed by the target user, will automatically execute arbitrary code on the target system.This can be exploited via USB storage devices to cause automatic code execution when the USB device directory is viewed via Microsoft Explorer or other file managers. This can also be exploited via a web site, remote share, or certain types of documents.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.This vulnerability is one of the flaws exploited by the Stuxnet worm.Sergey I. Ulasen and Uleg Kopreev of VirusBlokAda reported this vulnerability. Andreas Marx and Maik Morgenstern of AV-Test reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://anti-virus.by/en/tempo.shtml
CVE-2010-2568.extra: A remote user can create a shortcut file with an icon that, when viewed by the target user via a file manager, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2569.title: Microsoft Publisher Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2569.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Publisher. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Publisher file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, indexing error, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2569.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2570.title: Microsoft Publisher Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2570.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Publisher. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Publisher file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, indexing error, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2570.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2571.title: Microsoft Publisher Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2571.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Publisher. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Publisher file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, indexing error, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2571.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2580.title: MailEnable SMTP Command Length Validation Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-2580.body: A vulnerability was reported in MailEnable. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SMTP MAIL FROM command value or RCPT TO command value to cause the target SMTP service (MESMTPC.exe) to crash.The vendor was notified on September 6, 2010.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2010-112/Dmitriy Pletnev of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2580.extra: A remote user can cause the target SMTP service to crash.

CVE-2010-2581.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2581.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The 'dirapi.dll' and 'IML32.dll' modules are affected.Junaid Bohio (Vulnerability Research Team, TELUS Security Labs), Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point IPS Research Team, binaryproof via TippingPoint, and an anonymous reporter via TippingPoint reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2581.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2582.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2582.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The 'dirapi.dll' and 'IML32.dll' modules are affected.Junaid Bohio (Vulnerability Research Team, TELUS Security Labs), Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point IPS Research Team, binaryproof via TippingPoint, and an anonymous reporter via TippingPoint reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2582.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2583.title: SonicWALL SSL-VPN End-Point Interrogator/Installer ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2583.body: A vulnerability was reported in SonicWALL SSL-VPN. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the Install3rdPartyComponent() method in the 'Aventail.EPInstaller' ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Version 10.5.1.117 of the ActiveX control is affected.The vendor was notified on September 28, 2010.Dmitriy Pletnev, Secunia Research, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2583.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2587.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2587.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, input validation flaw, use-after-free, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Krystian Kloskowski (h07), working with Secunia Research, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, Andrzej Dyjak of iDefense Labs, Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs (CVE-2010-4188), Aniway and Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint), an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2587.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2588.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2588.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, input validation flaw, use-after-free, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Krystian Kloskowski (h07), working with Secunia Research, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, Andrzej Dyjak of iDefense Labs, Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs (CVE-2010-4188), Aniway and Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint), an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2588.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2589.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2589.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, input validation flaw, use-after-free, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Krystian Kloskowski (h07), working with Secunia Research, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, Andrzej Dyjak of iDefense Labs, Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs (CVE-2010-4188), Aniway and Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint), an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2589.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2590.title: SAP Crystal Reports Buffer Overflow in ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2590.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP Crystal Reports. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the "CrystalReports12.CrystalPrintControl.1" ActiveX control (PrintControl.dll) and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The "ServerResourceVersion" property is affected.The vendor was notified on November 19, 2010.Dmitriy Pletnev of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2590.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2602.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server Buffer Overflow in Attachment Service Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2602.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlackBerry Enterprise Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted PDF file that, when opened by the target user on a BlackBerry smartphone that is associated with a user account on the target BlackBerry Enterprise Server, will trigger a buffer overflow in the PDF distiller component of the BlackBerry Attachment Service and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The following versions are affected:* BlackBerry Enterprise Server Express version 5.0.1 and 5.0.2 for Microsoft Exchange* BlackBerry Enterprise Server Express version 5.0.2 for IBM Lotus Domino* BlackBerry Enterprise Server versions 4.1.3 through 5.0.2 for Microsoft Exchange and IBM Lotus Domino* BlackBerry Enterprise Server versions 4.1.3 through 5.0.1 for Novell GroupWise* BlackBerry Professional Software version 4.1.4 for Microsoft Exchange and IBM Lotus Domino
CVE-2010-2602.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2603.title: BlackBerry Desktop Software Weak Password Lets Local Users Decrypt the Backup File
CVE-2010-2603.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlackBerry Desktop Software. A local user can decrypt the backup file.The BlackBerry Desktop Software user uses a weak password method. A local user can conduct brute force guessing attacks to decrypt the backup file.BlackBerry smartphones and the BlackBerry Device Software are not affected.ElcomSoft Co. Ltd. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2603.extra: A local user can decrypt the backup file.

CVE-2010-2604.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server Buffer Overflow in Attachment Service PDF Distiller Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2604.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlackBerry Enterprise Server. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the PDF distiller and execute arbitrary code on the target BlackBerry Enterprise Server.The following product versions are affected:BlackBerry Enterprise Server Express version 5.0.1 and 5.0.2 for Microsoft ExchangeBlackBerry Enterprise Server Express version 5.0.2 for IBM Lotus DominoBlackBerry Enterprise Server versions 4.1.3 through 5.0.2 for Microsoft Exchange and IBM Lotus DominoBlackBerry Enterprise Server versions 4.1.3 through 5.0.1 for Novell GroupWiseBlackBerry Professional Software version 4.1.4 for Microsoft Exchange and IBM Lotus Domino
CVE-2010-2604.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2628.title: strongSwan snprintf() Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2628.body: A vulnerability was reported in strongSwan. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can supply specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2010-2628.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2629.title: Cisco Content Services Switch HTTP and ClientCert Headers Can Be Spoofed or Modified By Remote USers
CVE-2010-2629.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Cisco Content Services Switch. A remote user may be able to spoof a target user's identity.A remote user can supply a specially crafted "ClientCert" HTTP header that will be passed on to the target endpoint [CVE-2010-1575]. On an endpoint application that relies on the target device to authenticate clients, a remote user may be able to spoof a user's identity.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCSZ04690 to this vulnerability.HTTP newline sequences are not properly interpreted [CVE-2010-1576]. A remote user can supply specially crafted newline sequences to cause the target device to fail to properly insert "ClientCert" header values.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCTA04885 to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on June 5, 2009.George D. Gal of Virtual Security Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.vsecurity.com/resources/advisory/20100702-1/
CVE-2010-2629.extra: A remote user may be able to spoof a user's identity.

CVE-2010-2629.title: Cisco Application Control Engine Newline Processing Flaw May Let Remote Users Modify HTTP Headers
CVE-2010-2629.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Application Control Engine. A remote user may be able to modify HTTP headers added by the target device.HTTP newline sequences are not properly interpreted. A remote user can supply specially crafted newline sequences to cause the target device to fail to insert the "ClientCert" header values.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCTA04885 to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on June 5, 2009.George D. Gal of Virtual Security Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.vsecurity.com/resources/advisory/20100702-1/
CVE-2010-2629.extra: A remote user may be able to modify HTTP headers added by the target device.

CVE-2010-2639.title: IBM WebSphere Commerce May Disclose One User's Messages to Another User
CVE-2010-2639.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user may be able to obtain messages destined for a different user due to an error when the outbound messaging system accesses the RunTimeProfileCacheCmdImpl class.
CVE-2010-2639.extra: A remote user can obtain messages destined for another user.

CVE-2010-2640.title: Evince Font Parsing Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2640.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Evince. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an array index error, heap overflow, or integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system if a specially crafted font file has been installed. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jon Larimer of IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2640.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2641.title: Evince Font Parsing Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2641.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Evince. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an array index error, heap overflow, or integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system if a specially crafted font file has been installed. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jon Larimer of IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2641.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jon Larimer of IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jon Larimer of IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2010-2693.title: FreeBSD mbug Flag Error Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-2693.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system does not properly set the read-only flag when duplicating an mbuf buffer reference. A local user can exploit this flaw to cause data corruption of system files and obtain elevated privileges.Ming Fu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2693.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-2703.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Buffer Overflow in 'nnmrptconfig.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2703.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in 'nnmrptconfig.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target web service.The vendor was notified on June 16, 2010.Sebastien Renaud of VUPEN Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2703.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2703.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Buffer Overflow in 'ov.dll' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code
CVE-2010-2703.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in 'ov.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Only Windows-based systems are affected.The vendor was notified on February 2, 2010.Sebastien Renaud of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team reported this vulnerability. An anonymous researcher also reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2010-2703.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2709.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2709.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.No details were provided.Nahuel Riva from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2709.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2745.title: Windows Media Player Object Deallocation Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2745.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted media content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an object deallocation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft reports that users of Internet Explorer are not affected but that users of other browsers may be affected.SkyLined of Google Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2745.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2746.title: Windows Common Control Library Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2746.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Common Control Library. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in 'Comctl32.dll' when using a third-party scalable vector graphics (SVG) viewer and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Krystian Kloskowski (h07) reported this vulnerability via Secunia.
CVE-2010-2746.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2771.title: IBM solidDB Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code via a Long Username Field Value
CVE-2010-2771.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM solidDB. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted username value to 'solid.exe' on TCP port 1315 to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on June 30, 2010.AbdulAziz Hariri and Zein Fneish Insight Technologies reported this vulnerability via Zero Day Initiative (ZDI).
CVE-2010-2771.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2798.title: Linux Kernel GFS2 Rename Null Pointer Dereference May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-2798.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user with write access to a GFS2-mounted file system can perform a specially crafted rename operation to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause denial of service conditions or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in gfs2_dirent_find_space() in 'fs/gfs2/dir.c'.Grant Diffey of CenITex reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2798.extra: A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2010-2860.title: EMC Celerra Network Attached Storage Lets Remote Users Access the NFS Data Directory
CVE-2010-2860.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Celerra Network Attached Storage. A remote user with the ability to spoof IP addresses can gain full access to the exported NFS directory.The system grants access to remote users using an IP address white list intended for internal device communications. A remote user can spoof certain IP addresses to mount and gain full access to the root NFS export on the target device.The vendor was notified on May 7, 2010.Steve Ocepek of Trustwave's SpiderLabs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2860.extra: A remote user with the ability to spoof IP addresses can gain full access to the exported NFS directory.

CVE-2010-2863.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Deny Service
CVE-2010-2863.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can also cause the target player to crash.Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, TippingPoint FuzzBox (as driven by Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown), Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point, an anonymous researcher via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Aaron Portnoy, Logan Brown, Team lollersk8erz, and Team Montreal Hotties reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2863.extra: A remote user can create Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or cause the target player to crash.

CVE-2010-2885.title: Adobe RoboHelp Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-2885.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe RoboHelp. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RoboHelp-created pages and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.RoboHelp for Word, when used to generate WebHelp, is affected [CVE-2010-2885]. David Damstra of CU*Answers reported this vulnerability.Other components are affected [CVE-2010-2886]. James Jardine of Jardine Software Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2885.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RoboHelp-created pages, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
