As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.RoboHelp for Word, when used to generate WebHelp, is affected [CVE-2010-2885]. David Damstra of CU*Answers reported this vulnerability.Other components are affected [CVE-2010-2886]. James Jardine of Jardine Software Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2886.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RoboHelp-created pages, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-2892.title: LANDesk Management Gateway Input Validation Error Lets Remote Authenticated Administrators Injection Operating System Commands
CVE-2010-2892.body: A vulnerability was reported in LANDesk Management Gateway. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary operating system commands on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted request to inject operating system commands on the target system. The commands will run with 'gsbadmin' user privileges. This can be exploited to shutdown the firewall or load arbitrary kernel modules.The vendor was notified on October 18, 2010.Aureliano Calvo from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2892.extra: A remote authenticated administrator can execute arbitrary operating system commands on the target system.

CVE-2010-2913.title: Citi Mobile Local File Storage May Disclose Potentially Sensitive Information to Local Users
CVE-2010-2913.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citi Mobile. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive account information.The application stores potentially sensitive information in a hidden file on the device, including account numbers, bill payments, and security access codes. A local user may be able to access the information.If the device data is backed up via iTunes, a local user on the system hosting iTunes may also be able to access the information.
CVE-2010-2913.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive account information, including account numbers, bill payments, and security access codes.

CVE-2010-2914.title: Nessus Web Server Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-2914.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Nessus Web Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can determine the version number.The web server (nessusd_www_server.nbin) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target operator, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Nessus software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Emmanuel Bouillon from the NATO C3 Agency reported this vulnerability.A remote user can request the /feed method to determine the version number of nessusd.Jason Jones from Inner Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2914.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Nessus software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the nessusd version number.

CVE-2010-2935.title: OpenOffice.org Impress Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2935.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenOffice.org Impress. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Office PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer truncation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-2935]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Office PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-2936]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Charlie Miller of Independent Security Evaluators reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2935.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2935.title: OpenOffice Bugs in Processing PowerPoint Files Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2935.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The following researchers reported these and other Oracle vulnerabilities:Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security; Alexandr Polyakov of Digital Security; Alexey Sintsov of Digital Security Research Group; Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod, working with TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative; Andrey Labunets of Digital Security Research Group; Cris Neckar of Neohapsis, Inc.; Daniel Fahlgren; Esteban Martinez Fayo of Application Security, Inc.; Evdokimov Dmitriy of Digital Security Research Group; Karan Saberwal; Laszlo Toth; Maksymilian Arciemowicz of SecurityReason; Martin Rakhmanov of Application Security, Inc.; Matt Parcell of Accuvant; Monarch2020 of unsecurityresearch.com; Robert Clugston of Accuvant; Roberto Suggi Liverani of Security-Assessment.com; Rodrigo Rubira Branco (BSDaemon) via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative; and Sumit Siddharth from 7safe.
CVE-2010-2935.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2936.title: OpenOffice.org Impress Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2936.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenOffice.org Impress. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Office PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer truncation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-2935]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Office PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-2936]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Charlie Miller of Independent Security Evaluators reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2936.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2936.title: OpenOffice Bugs in Processing PowerPoint Files Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2936.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The following researchers reported these and other Oracle vulnerabilities:Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security; Alexandr Polyakov of Digital Security; Alexey Sintsov of Digital Security Research Group; Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod, working with TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative; Andrey Labunets of Digital Security Research Group; Cris Neckar of Neohapsis, Inc.; Daniel Fahlgren; Esteban Martinez Fayo of Application Security, Inc.; Evdokimov Dmitriy of Digital Security Research Group; Karan Saberwal; Laszlo Toth; Maksymilian Arciemowicz of SecurityReason; Martin Rakhmanov of Application Security, Inc.; Matt Parcell of Accuvant; Monarch2020 of unsecurityresearch.com; Robert Clugston of Accuvant; Roberto Suggi Liverani of Security-Assessment.com; Rodrigo Rubira Branco (BSDaemon) via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative; and Sumit Siddharth from 7safe.
CVE-2010-2936.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2939.title: OpenSSL Key Exchange Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-2939.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions and may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote server can return specially crafted data to a connected client to trigger a memory corruption error and cause the target client to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.Georgi Guninski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2939.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2941.title: CUPS IPP Request Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2941.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted IPP request to trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Emmanuel Bouillon of NATO C3 Agency reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2941.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-2952.title: Apache Traffic Server Insufficient Randomization Lets Remote Users Poison the DNS Cache
CVE-2010-2952.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Traffic Server. A remote user can poison the DNS cache.The system uses predictable query ids and DNS source port numbers. A remote user can send forged response packets to poison the DNS cache.Tim Brown reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2952.extra: A remote user can poison the DNS cache.

CVE-2010-2960.title: Linux Kernel Null Pointer Dereference in keyctl_session_to_parent() May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-2960.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a null pointer dereference in keyctl_session_to_parent() and cause denial of service conditions or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Tavis Ormandy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2960.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-2963.title: Linux Kernel VIDIOCSMICROCODE Access Control Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-2963.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can can exploit a flaw in the ioctl32 v4l1 compatibility code for VIDIOCSMICROCODE to write to arbitrary kernel memory locations and gain elevated privileges.Kees Cook reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-2963.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-2996.title: RealPlayer Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Files and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2996.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain files from the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted RealPlayer QCP file can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2010-0116]. Windows RealPlayer SP versions 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted dimensions in the YUV420 transformation of MP4 content can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0117]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted QCP data can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2010-0120]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted IVR file can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-2996]. Windows RealPlayer 11.1 and prior versions are affected. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A specially crafted FLV file can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2010-3000]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Sebastian Apelt and siberas reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A flaw in the ActiveX IE Plugin has unspecified impact [CVE-2010-3001]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Steve Manzuik of Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) reported this vulnerability.A flaw in the ActivX control allows a remote user to access files on the target user's system [CVE-2010-3002]. Windows RealPlayer 11.1 and prior versions are affected. Behrang Fouladi of SensePost reported this vulnerability.The RealPlayer Enterprise, Mac RealPlayer, Linux RealPlayer, and Helix Player are not affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2996.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access files on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2997.title: RealPlayer Buffer Overflows and Memory Corruption Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2997.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.RealPlayer Enterprise is also affected.Nicolas Joly and Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, anonymous researchers, Sebastian Apelt, Andreas Schmidt, AbdulAziz Hariri, and Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Alin Rad Pop and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Aaron Portnoy, Zef Cekaj, and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs, Omair, iDefense Labs, and Team lollersk8erz reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2997.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-2999.title: RealPlayer Buffer Overflows and Memory Corruption Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-2999.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.RealPlayer Enterprise is also affected.Nicolas Joly and Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, anonymous researchers, Sebastian Apelt, Andreas Schmidt, AbdulAziz Hariri, and Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Alin Rad Pop and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Aaron Portnoy, Zef Cekaj, and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs, Omair, iDefense Labs, and Team lollersk8erz reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-2999.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3000.title: RealPlayer Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Files and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3000.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain files from the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted RealPlayer QCP file can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2010-0116]. Windows RealPlayer SP versions 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted dimensions in the YUV420 transformation of MP4 content can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-0117]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted QCP data can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2010-0120]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted IVR file can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-2996]. Windows RealPlayer 11.1 and prior versions are affected. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A specially crafted FLV file can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2010-3000]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Sebastian Apelt and siberas reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A flaw in the ActiveX IE Plugin has unspecified impact [CVE-2010-3001]. Windows RealPlayer SP 1.1.4 and prior versions are affected. Steve Manzuik of Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) reported this vulnerability.A flaw in the ActivX control allows a remote user to access files on the target user's system [CVE-2010-3002]. Windows RealPlayer 11.1 and prior versions are affected. Behrang Fouladi of SensePost reported this vulnerability.The RealPlayer Enterprise, Mac RealPlayer, Linux RealPlayer, and Helix Player are not affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3000.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access files on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3010.title: 3Com OfficeConnect Gigabit VPN Firewall Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-3010.body: A vulnerability was reported in the 3Com OfficeConnect Gigabit VPN Firewall. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The device does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the 3Com OfficeConnect Gigabit VPN Firewall device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Jonathan Grier of VESARiA reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3010.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the 3Com OfficeConnect Gigabit VPN Firewall device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-3032.title: Crystal Reports GIOP Message Size Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3032.body: A vulnerability was reported in Crystal Reports. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an integer overflow in 'ebus-3-3-2-6.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.The vendor was notified on May 3, 2010.The original advisory is available at:http://dvlabs.tippingpoint.com/advisory/TPTI-10-07Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3032.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3035.title: Cisco IOS XR BGP Attribute Processing Flaw Permits Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2010-3035.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote authenticated BGP peer can cause denial of service conditions.When a BGP peer announces a prefix with a specific and valid but unrecognized transitive attribute, the target Cisco IOS XR device will corrupt the attribute before sending it to neighboring devices, causing the neighboring devices to reset the BGP peering session.Cisco IOS XR devices that are not configured for BGP routing are not affected.Cisco IOS is not affected.
CVE-2010-3035.extra: A remote authenticated BGP peer can cause peers of the target IOS XR device to cause neighboring peers to reset the peering session.

CVE-2010-3036.title: CiscoWorks Common Services Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3036.body: A vulnerability was reported in CiscoWorks. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP port 443 or 1741 to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with system administrator privileges.CiscoWorks Common Services for Oracle Solaris and Microsoft Windows are affected.Cisco Unified Operations Manager, Cisco Unified Service Monitor, CiscoWorks QoS Policy Manager, CiscoWorks LAN Management Solution, Cisco Security Manager, and Cisco TelePresence Readiness Assessment Manager are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti41352 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3036.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3037.title: Cisco Unified Videoconferencing Lets Remote Users Access the System and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3037.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Videoconferencing. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can access the system using default credentials.The Linux shell contains three hard-coded usernames and passwords that cannot be changed or deleted [CVE-2010-3038]. A remote user can access the accounts. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54008 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to to the web server interface to inject and execute arbitrary commands with root-level privilege on the target system [CVE-2010-3037]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54059 to this vulnerability.The system stores administrator and operator account passwords for the web interface in unencrypted form. A local user can obtain the passwords. Only Linux-based Cisco UVC products are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54010 to this vulnerability.The FTP server is enabled by default. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti72032 to this vulnerability.The shadow password file on Linux-based Cisco UVC products is world-readable. Cisco as assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54043 to this vulnerability.The SSH server permits X.11 forwarding and socks proxies by default. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54045 to this vulnerability.The web interface on Linux-based Cisco UVC products runs with root privileges. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54047 to this vulnerability.The web interface uses predictable session IDs. A remote user may be able to hijack a user session. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54048 to this vulnerability.The system stores user credentials in cookies on the target user's system. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCti54052 to this vulnerability.The following Cisco UVC Linux operating system products are affected by some of these vulnerabilities: * Cisco Unified Videoconferencing 5110 System * Cisco Unified Videoconferencing 5115 SystemThe following Cisco UVC VxWorks operating system products are affected by some of these vulnerabilities: * Cisco Unified Videoconferencing 5230 System * Cisco Unified Videoconferencing 3545 System * Cisco Unified Videoconferencing 3527 Primary Rate Interface (PRI) Gateway * Cisco Unified Videoconferencing 3522 Basic Rate Interfaces (BRI) Gateway * Cisco Unified Videoconferencing 3515 Multipoint Control Unit (MCU)Florent Daigniere of Matta Consulting reported these vulnerabilities.The original advisory is available at:http://www.trustmatta.com/advisories/MATTA-2010-001.txt
CVE-2010-3037.extra: A remote user can access the system.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root-level privileges.

CVE-2010-3039.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager setuid Binary Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2010-3039.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can supply specially crafted command line arguments to a set user id (setuid) binary to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.The vendor was notified on August 21, 2010.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug IDs CSCti52041 and CSCti74930 to this vulnerability.Knud Erik Hjgaard of nSense reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3039.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-3040.title: Cisco Unified Intelligent Contact Management Buffer Overflows in 'Agent.exe' Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3040.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Intelligent Contact Management. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the setup agent (agent.exe) on TCP port 40078 to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on June 1, 2010.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug IDs CSCti45698, CSCti45715, CSCti45726, and CSCti46164 to this vulnerability.sb reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-3040.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3041.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3041.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted WebEx Recording Format (.wrf) or Advanced Recording Format (.arf) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.These vulnerabilities cannot be triggered by users who are attending a WebEx meeting.TippingPoint and Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3041.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3042.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3042.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted WebEx Recording Format (.wrf) or Advanced Recording Format (.arf) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.These vulnerabilities cannot be triggered by users who are attending a WebEx meeting.TippingPoint and Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3042.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3043.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3043.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted WebEx Recording Format (.wrf) or Advanced Recording Format (.arf) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.These vulnerabilities cannot be triggered by users who are attending a WebEx meeting.TippingPoint and Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3043.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3044.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3044.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted WebEx Recording Format (.wrf) or Advanced Recording Format (.arf) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.These vulnerabilities cannot be triggered by users who are attending a WebEx meeting.TippingPoint and Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3044.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3069.title: Samba Buffer Overflow in sid_parse() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3069.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted Windows Security ID data to trigger a stack overflow in sid_parse() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target smbd service.Andrew Bartlett of Cisco reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3069.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3078.title: Linux Kernel xfs_ioc_fsgetxattr() Initialization Error Lets Local Users View Kernel Memory
CVE-2010-3078.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory.The XFS_IOC_FSGETXATTR ioctl does not properly initialize stack memory. A local user can exploit this to read portions of kernel memory.The vulnerability resides in 'fs/xfs/xfs_ioctl.c'.The original advisory is available at:http://www.linux.sgi.com/archives/xfs-masters/2010-09/msg00002.html
CVE-2010-3078.extra: A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory.

CVE-2010-3172.title: Bugzilla Permits Cross-Site Scripting and HTTP Response Splitting Attacks and Discloses Certain Information to Remote Users
CVE-2010-3172.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Bugzilla. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct HTTP response splitting attacks. A remote user can view graphs from Old Charts.The YUI library component (v2.8.1) does not properly filter HTML code from '.swf' files. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Bugzilla software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to cause the target server to return a split response [CVE-2010-3172]. A remote user can exploit this to spoof content on the target server, attempt to poison any intermediate web caches, or conduct cross-site scripting attacks against browsers that support "Server Push".A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to browse graphs generated by the Old Charts system [CVE-2010-3764]. This can be exploited to see product names and charted information about those products.
CVE-2010-3172.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Bugzilla software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause arbitrary content to be displayed.A remote user may be able to poison any intermediate web caches with arbitrary content.A remote user can view graphs from Old Charts.

CVE-2010-3187.title: IBM AIX Buffer Overflow in ftpd Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3187.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX ftpd. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted NLST command to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.In some configurations (where FTP allows write access), a remote authenticated user can exploit this flaw to obtain DES-encrypted user hashes.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/14456/Kingcope reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3187.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3189.title: Trend Micro Internet Security Pro Memory Access Error in 'UfPBCtrl.dll' ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3189.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro Internet Security Pro. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory access error in the extSetOwner() function of the UfPBCtrl.dll ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative (ZDI).
CVE-2010-3189.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3222.title: Windows LPC Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-3222.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can send a specially crafted LPC message to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.[Editor's note: This may be a duplicate of Alert ID 1024537.]
CVE-2010-3222.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-3223.title: Microsoft Cluster Service Disk Permission Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-3223.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows 2008 Microsoft Cluster Service. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Failover Cluster Manager user interface uses non-secure default permissions when adding disks to a cluster. A local user may be able to gain read/write/delete access on the administrative shares on the target failover cluster disk.
CVE-2010-3223.extra: A local user can obtain read/write/delete access on the administrative shares on the target failover cluster disk.

CVE-2010-3227.title: Microsoft Foundation Classes Library Buffer Overflow in Window Title Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3227.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Foundation Classes. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user with the ability to supply a specially crafted value that will be displayed by an application built with the Microsoft Foundation Class (MFC) Library as a window title value can trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten H. Eiram of Secunia reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3227.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3268.title: Symantec Antivirus Corporate Edition Input Validation Flaw in Intel Handler Service Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-3268.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted 'CommandLine' parameter value to the Intel Handler Service to cause the target 'hndlrsvc.exe' service to crash.The vendor was notified on August 12, 2010.Nahuel Riva from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3268.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2010-3269.title: Cisco WebEx Player and WebEx Meeting Center Stack Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3269.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Player and WebEx Meeting Center. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.wrf' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in the WebEx Player and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-3269]. This flaw can be exploited by a remote user publishing a '.wrf' video file in an active meeting to execute arbitrary code on the systems of the meeting participants.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.atp' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in the WebEx Meeting Center and execute arbitrary code on the systems of the meeting participants [CVE-2010-3270].The vendor was notified on October 4, 2010.Federico Muttis, Sebastian Tello, and Manuel Muradas from Core Security Technologies reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3269.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3270.title: Cisco WebEx Player and WebEx Meeting Center Stack Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3270.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Player and WebEx Meeting Center. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.wrf' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in the WebEx Player and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-3269]. This flaw can be exploited by a remote user publishing a '.wrf' video file in an active meeting to execute arbitrary code on the systems of the meeting participants.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.atp' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in the WebEx Meeting Center and execute arbitrary code on the systems of the meeting participants [CVE-2010-3270].The vendor was notified on October 4, 2010.Federico Muttis, Sebastian Tello, and Manuel Muradas from Core Security Technologies reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3270.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3275.title: VLC Media Player Buffer Overflow in Processing AMV and NSV Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3275.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.AMV' or '.NSV' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on February 8, 2011.Ricardo Narvaja from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3275.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3276.title: VLC Media Player Buffer Overflow in Processing AMV and NSV Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3276.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.AMV' or '.NSV' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on February 8, 2011.Ricardo Narvaja from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3276.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3277.title: VMware Workstation and Player Installer Displays HTML File From Current Working Directory
CVE-2010-3277.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation and Player Installer. A remote user may be able to cause an HTML file to be displayed.The installer will load an 'index.htm' file located in the current working directory when Workstation 7.x or Player 3.x is being installed.A remote user that can place the HTML file prior to installation can cause the file to be displayed during installation.Alexander Trofimov and Marc Esher independently reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3277.extra: A remote user may be able to cause an HTML file to be displayed during installation in certain cases.

CVE-2010-3288.title: HP System Insight Manager Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2010-3288.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Systems Insight Manager. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2010-3290].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP System Insight Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2010-3288, CVE-2010-3289].
CVE-2010-3288.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP System Insight Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-3289.title: HP System Insight Manager Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2010-3289.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Systems Insight Manager. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2010-3290].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP System Insight Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2010-3288, CVE-2010-3289].
CVE-2010-3289.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP System Insight Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-3291.title: HP AssetManager and HP AssetCenter Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-3291.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP AssetManager and HP AssetCenter. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP AssetManager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.HP AssetCenter 5.0x version AC_5.0 and prior is also affected.
CVE-2010-3291.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP AssetManager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-3302.title: Openswan Buffer Overflows Let Remote Authenticated Gateways Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3302.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Openswan. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated gateway can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted cisco_dns_info or cisco_domain_info values can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3302, CVE-2010-3752].A specially crafted cisco_banner value can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3308, CVE-2010-3753].D. Hugh Redelmeier and and Paul Wouters reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3302.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3308.title: Openswan Buffer Overflows Let Remote Authenticated Gateways Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3308.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Openswan. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated gateway can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted cisco_dns_info or cisco_domain_info values can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3302, CVE-2010-3752].A specially crafted cisco_banner value can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3308, CVE-2010-3753].D. Hugh Redelmeier and and Paul Wouters reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3308.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3333.title: Microsoft Office Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3333.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted file can trigger an integer underflow [CVE-2010-2573].Specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) data can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2010-3333].Specially crafted art drawing records can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3334].Specially crafted drawing data can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3335].Specially crafted Office files can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3336].A remote user can create a specially crafted DLL. If the DLL is in a working directory when the target user opens an Office file from the same working directory, the DLL may be executed [CVE-2010-3337].team509 via VeriSign iDefense Labs, Dyon Balding of Secunia, Will Dorman of CERT Coordination Center, TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, and Simon Raner of ACROS Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3333.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3338.title: Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-3338.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Task Scheduler. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Task Scheduler does not properly validate whether a scheduled task is running within the intended security context. A local user can schedule an arbitrary task to run in the context of the System or Administrator accounts.Sergey Golovanov, Alexander Gostev, Maxim Golovkin, and Alexey Monastyrsky of Kaspersky Lab, Vitaly Kiktenko and Alexander Saprykin of Design and Test Lab, Liam O Murchu of Symantec, and Alexandr Matrosov, Eugene Rodionov, Juraj Malcho, and David Harley of ESET reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3338.extra: A local user can schedule an arbitrary task to run in the context of the System or Administrator accounts.

CVE-2010-3340.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Conduct Cross-Domain Attacks
CVE-2010-3340.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer (IE). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-domain attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-3340, CVE-2010-3343, CVE-2010-3345, CVE-2010-3346. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access information in another domain or Internet Explorer zone [CVE-2010-3342, CVE-2010-3348].Aniway of VeriSign iDefense Labs, Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, Stephen Fewer (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Peter Vreugdenhil (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Yosuke Hasegawa, and Jose Antonio Vazquez Gonzalez of VeriSign iDefense Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3340.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can access information in another domain or Internet Explorer zone.

CVE-2010-3405.title: IBM AIX Buffer Overflow in sa_snap Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-3405.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user in the system group can trigger a buffer overflow in '/usr/esa/sbin/sa_snap' to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root level privileges.
CVE-2010-3405.extra: A local user In the system group can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-3407.title: IBM Lotus Domino iCalendar Stack Overflow in MAILTO Processing Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3407.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Domino iCalendar. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a calendar request with a specially crafted MAILTO header value to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target 'nrouter.exe' service (System privileges).The vendor was notified on August 26, 2008.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via Tipping Point's Zero Day Initiative and MWR InfoSecurity reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3407.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3449.title: Apache Continuum Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2010-3449.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Continuum. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The administrative function to change user passwords does not properly validate the source of the request. A remote user can take actions on the site running the Apache Continuum acting as the target user.Anatolia Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3449.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site running the Apache Continuum software acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-3450.title: OpenOffice.org Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3450.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause files to be overwritten on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-3451, CVE-2010-3452, CVE-2010-3453, CVE-2010-3454, CVE-2010-4253, CVE-2010-4643]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The processing of RTF, Word, PNG, and TGA files are affected.A remote user can exploit a flaw in zip/jar package extraction to cause files outside the root of the destination folder to be overwritten [CVE-2010-3450].
CVE-2010-3450.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will overwrite arbitrary files on the target user's system with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2010-3452.title: OpenOffice.org Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3452.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause files to be overwritten on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-3451, CVE-2010-3452, CVE-2010-3453, CVE-2010-3454, CVE-2010-4253, CVE-2010-4643]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The processing of RTF, Word, PNG, and TGA files are affected.A remote user can exploit a flaw in zip/jar package extraction to cause files outside the root of the destination folder to be overwritten [CVE-2010-3450].
CVE-2010-3452.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will overwrite arbitrary files on the target user's system with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2010-3474.title: IBM DB2 Privilege Revocation Error May Let Remote Authenticated Users Access Restricted Objects
CVE-2010-3474.body: A vulnerability was reported in DB2. A remote authenticated user can access objects without proper privileges in certain cases.When privileges on a database object are revoked from PUBLIC, the dependent functions are not marked INVALID. A remote authenticated user with execute privileges can invoke a user-defined function to access objects that the user is no longer privileged to access.
CVE-2010-3474.extra: A remote authenticated user can access objects on the target system for which the user's privileges have been revoked.

CVE-2010-3475.title: IBM DB2 May Let Remote Authenticated Users Update Tables Without Privileges in Certain Cases
CVE-2010-3475.body: A vulnerability was reported in DB2. A remote authenticated user can execute certain statements without the required privileges.If a compiled compound SQL statement has been issued by an authorized user, the command is cached. In certain cases where the statement includes an update statement against a table, a remote authenticated user without privileges to access the table may be able to invoke the cached command to execute the query.
CVE-2010-3475.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute certain statements without the required privileges.

CVE-2010-3477.title: Linux Kernel tcf_act_police_dump() Function Lets Local Users Obtain Portions of Kernel Memory
CVE-2010-3477.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive kernel memory contents.The tcf_act_police_dump() function in 'net/sched/act_police.c' does not properly initialize certain structure members. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from kernel memory.
CVE-2010-3477.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive kernel memory contents.

CVE-2010-3613.title: BIND Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Access Controls and Deny Service
CVE-2010-3613.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in BIND. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass access controls.When certain types of signed negative responses are added to the cache, matching RRSIG records already in the cache are not cleared [CVE-2010-3613]. A remote user can subsequently perform a lookup of the cached data can cause named to crash.When named is acting as a DNSSEC validator, it may incorrectly determine that an NS RRset is insecure when there isn't a matching key for the RRSIG in the DNSKEY RRset when resuming from validating the DNSKEY RRset (such as during a DNSKEY algorithm rollover when two different algorithms are used to sign a zone but only the new set of keys are in the zone DNSKEY RRset) [CVE-2010-3614]. When named is running as an authoritative server for a zone and the allow-query statement is not set in the zone statement, the system defaults to allowing the query [CVE-2010-3615]. A remote user can send a query for that zone data to bypass the access controls.
CVE-2010-3613.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can bypass access controls.

CVE-2010-3616.title: ISC DHCP TCP Failover Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-3616.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC DHCP. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the target server on a port that has been configured for communication with a failover peer to cause the target server to stop responding to all normal DHCP protocol traffic.The server must be restarted to return to normal operation.Brad Bendily reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3616.extra: A remote user can cause the target server to stop responding to all normal DHCP protocol traffic.

CVE-2010-3618.title: PGP Desktop Data Insertion Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Message Verification
CVE-2010-3618.body: A vulnerability was reported in PGP Desktop. A remote user can inject unsigned data into a message that will be verified as trusted.A remote user can inject unsigned data into an OpenPGP message that has been signed by a trusted source. When the message is decrypted and verified by the recipient, PGP Desktop may incorrectly identify the message as being valid.PGP Command Line versions 9.6 and later are not affected.Eric Verheul, Digital Security group, Radbound University Nijmengen, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3618.extra: A remote user can inject unsigned data into a message that will be verified as trusted.

CVE-2010-3653.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3653.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2010-3653.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3654.title: Adobe Flash Player Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3654.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2010-3654.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3654.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat Flaw in 'authplay.dll' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3654.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Reader and Acrobat. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the 'authplay.dll' component.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.Adobe Reader and Acrobat version 8.x are not affected.Adobe Reader for Android is not affected.
CVE-2010-3654.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3655.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3655.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The 'dirapi.dll' and 'IML32.dll' modules are affected.Junaid Bohio (Vulnerability Research Team, TELUS Security Labs), Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs, Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Check Point IPS Research Team, binaryproof via TippingPoint, and an anonymous reporter via TippingPoint reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3655.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3689.title: OpenOffice.org Library Loading Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3689.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can create a specially crafted library file on the target user's current directory. In certain cases, the application may load the user's library instead of the intended DLL and execute arbitrary code.This type of exploit is also known as "binary planting" or "DLL preloading".
CVE-2010-3689.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3699.title: Xen Backend Driver Thread Leak Lets Local Guest Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-3699.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the backend driver to leak a kernel thread and prevent the virtual machine from being shutdown or prevent most xm commands from working.
CVE-2010-3699.extra: A local user can on the guest operating system can prevent the virtual machine from being shutdown.

CVE-2010-3708.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Deny Service, and Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2010-3708.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can supply specially-crafted data to a JBoss Seam based application that accepts serialized input to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the target JBoss server process [CVE-2010-3708].A remote user can exploit a cross-site request forgery attack to deploy an arbitrary WAR file on the target server [CVE-2010-3878].A remote user can send specially-crafted data to cause the target JBoss Remoting listeners to become unresponsive [CVE-2010-3862]. Ole Husgaard of eXerp.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3708.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can deploy an arbitrary WAR file on the target system.

CVE-2010-3709.title: PHP Null Pointer Dereference in ZipArchive::getArchiveComment() May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3709.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted zip archive that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a null pointer dereference in the ZipArchive::getArchiveComment() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The original advisory is available at:http://securityreason.com/achievement_securityalert/90Maksymilian Arciemowicz of securityreason.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3709.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The specific impact depends on the application using the affected function.

CVE-2010-3711.title: Pidgin purple_base64_decode() Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-3711.body: A vulnerability was reported in Pidgin. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the validation of return values from the purple_base64_decode() function and cause the target application to crash.The Yahoo!, MSN, MySpaceIM, and XMPP protocol plugins and the NTLM authentication implementation are affected.Daniel Atallah reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3711.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2010-3752.title: Openswan Buffer Overflows Let Remote Authenticated Gateways Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3752.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Openswan. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated gateway can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted cisco_dns_info or cisco_domain_info values can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3302, CVE-2010-3752].A specially crafted cisco_banner value can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3308, CVE-2010-3753].D. Hugh Redelmeier and and Paul Wouters reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3752.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3753.title: Openswan Buffer Overflows Let Remote Authenticated Gateways Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3753.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Openswan. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated gateway can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted cisco_dns_info or cisco_domain_info values can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3302, CVE-2010-3752].A specially crafted cisco_banner value can trigger code execution [CVE-2010-3308, CVE-2010-3753].D. Hugh Redelmeier and and Paul Wouters reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3753.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-3764.title: Bugzilla Permits Cross-Site Scripting and HTTP Response Splitting Attacks and Discloses Certain Information to Remote Users
CVE-2010-3764.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Bugzilla. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct HTTP response splitting attacks. A remote user can view graphs from Old Charts.The YUI library component (v2.8.1) does not properly filter HTML code from '.swf' files. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Bugzilla software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to cause the target server to return a split response [CVE-2010-3172]. A remote user can exploit this to spoof content on the target server, attempt to poison any intermediate web caches, or conduct cross-site scripting attacks against browsers that support "Server Push".A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to browse graphs generated by the Old Charts system [CVE-2010-3764]. This can be exploited to see product names and charted information about those products.
CVE-2010-3764.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Bugzilla software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause arbitrary content to be displayed.A remote user may be able to poison any intermediate web caches with arbitrary content.A remote user can view graphs from Old Charts.

CVE-2010-3765.title: Mozilla Seamonkey Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3765.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Seamonkey. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted scripting code that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted document.write() and appendChild() calls can create duplicate text frames and overwrite buffers.This vulnerability is being actively exploited on Windows-based systems.Morten Krakvik of Telenor SOC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3765.extra: A remote user can create scripting code that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3765.title: Mozilla Thunderbird Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3765.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Thunderbird. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted scripting code that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted document.write() and appendChild() calls can create duplicate text frames and overwrite buffers.The vulnerability is not triggered by reading mail. However, the vulnerability can be triggered via RSS feeds if JavaScript is enabled or via third party add-ons that enable browser-like functionality.This vulnerability is being actively exploited on Windows-based systems.Morten Krakvik of Telenor SOC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3765.extra: A remote user can create scripting code that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3765.extra: A remote user can create scripting code that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3766.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-3766.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jesee Ruderman, Andreas Gal, Nils, Brian Hackett, Igor Bukanov, Dirk Heinrich, Red Hat Security Response Team member Marc Schoenefeld, Mozilla security researcher Christoph Diehl, echo, Gregory Fleischer, wushi of team509, regenrecht (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Mozilla security researcher moz_bug_r_a4 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3766.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3770.title: Mozilla Firefox Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Cross-Site Scripting Protections
CVE-2010-3770.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can bypass cross-site scripting protections.A remote user can use x-mac-arabic, x-mac-farsi, and x-mac-hebrew character encodings to bypass cross-site scripting protections.Yosuke Hasegawa and Masatoshi Kimura reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3770.extra: A remote user can bypass cross-site scripting protections.

CVE-2010-3774.title: Mozilla Firefox Lets Remote Users Spoof the URL Location Bar
CVE-2010-3774.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can spoof the location bar.A remote user can inject arbitrary content into the error page generated when a network or certificate error has occurred. This can be exploited to spoof the location bar.Google security researcher Michal Zalewski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-3774.extra: A remote user can spoof the location bar.

CVE-2010-3777.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Thunderbird. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted e-mail that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jesee Ruderman, Andreas Gal, Nils, Brian Hackett, Igor Bukanov, Dirk Heinrich, Red Hat Security Response Team member Marc Schoenefeld, and Mozilla security researcher Christoph Diehl reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-3777.extra: A remote user can create an e-mail message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-3783.title: Mac OS X Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Deny Service, and Obtain Information
CVE-2010-3783.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote or remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target AFP Server to shutdown [CVE-2010-1828].A remote authenticated user can exploit a directory traversal flaw to create files and cause arbitrary code execution [CVE-2010-1829].A remote user can determine the existence of an AFP share [CVE-2010-1830].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow in AppKit [CVE-2010-1842]. Jesse Ruderman of Mozilla Corporation reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted font, document, disk image, or web page that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-1811, CVE-2010-1831, CVE-2010-1832, CVE-2010-1833, CVE-2010-1797, CVE-2010-1752, CVE-2010-1834, CVE-2010-1836, CVE-2010-1837, CVE-2010-1841, CVE-2010-1844, CVE-2010-1845, CVE-2010-1846, CVE-2010-3785, CVE-2010-3786, CVE-2010-3798].Marc Schoenefeld of Red Hat, Christoph Diehl of Mozilla, Matias Eissler and Anibal Sacco of Core Security Technologies, Laurent OUDOT of TEHTRI-Security, Neil Fryer of IT Security Geeks, Andrew Kiss, Tobias Klein via iDefense VCP, Steven Fisher of Discovery Software Ltd., and Dominic Chell of NGSSoftware reported these vulnerabilities.A local user can bypass the Directory Service password validation and login to a mobile account [CVE-2010-1838].A remote user can trigger a stack buffer overflow in Directory Services in the validation of password data to execute arbitrary code [CVE-2010-1840]. Rodrigo Rubira Branco from Check Point Vulnerability Discovery Team (VDT) and Rainer Mueller reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in diskdev_cmds to prevent the system from starting properly [CVE-2010-0105]. Maksymilian Arciemowicz of SecurityReason reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in the handling of terminal devices to trigger a memory management error and cause the system to shutdown [CVE-2010-1847].A remote user can send specially crafted Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) packets to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target system to shutdown [CVE-2010-1843]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.A remote attacker can login with an outdated password due to a Password Server replication flaw [CVE-2010-3783].A remote user can send specially crafted XML data to applications using the PMPageFormatCreateWithDataRepresentation API to trigger a null dereference and cause the target application to crash [CVE-2010-3784]. Wujun Li of Microsoft reported this vulnerability.A remote attacker can access a target user's Time Machine information [CVE-2010-1803].A remote user that can edit wiki pages can inject javascript to obtain the credentials of a target user [CVE-2010-3797].
CVE-2010-3783.extra: A remote user or remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can login to a mobile account.A remote user can obtain Time Machine information.A remote user can obtain a target user's Wiki Server credentials.
