CVE-2010-4207.title: Bugzilla Permits Cross-Site Scripting and HTTP Response Splitting Attacks and Discloses Certain Information to Remote Users
CVE-2010-4207.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Bugzilla. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct HTTP response splitting attacks. A remote user can view graphs from Old Charts.The YUI library component (v2.8.1) does not properly filter HTML code from '.swf' files. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Bugzilla software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to cause the target server to return a split response [CVE-2010-3172]. A remote user can exploit this to spoof content on the target server, attempt to poison any intermediate web caches, or conduct cross-site scripting attacks against browsers that support "Server Push".A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to browse graphs generated by the Old Charts system [CVE-2010-3764]. This can be exploited to see product names and charted information about those products.
CVE-2010-4207.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Bugzilla software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause arbitrary content to be displayed.A remote user may be able to poison any intermediate web caches with arbitrary content.A remote user can view graphs from Old Charts.

CVE-2010-4210.title: FreeBSD pseudofs Mutex Unlocking Error Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4210.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The pfs_getextattr(9) function attempts to unlock a mutex which was not previously locked.On systems where a pseudofs-using filesystem is mounted and NULL page mapping is allowed, a local can overwrite arbitrary kernel memory locations with zero and potentially execute arbitrary code.On systems that do not allow NULL page mapping, a local user can trigger a kernel panic.Przemyslaw Frasunek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4210.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause a kernel panic.

CVE-2010-4217.title: IBM Tivoli Directory Server Proxy Server Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2010-4217.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Directory Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send an unbind request during a page results search to cause the target back-end proxy server to crash.
CVE-2010-4217.extra: A remote user can cause the target proxy server to crash.

CVE-2010-4227.title: NetWare XNFS Stack Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4227.body: A vulnerability was reported in NetWare XNFS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the 'XNFS.NLM' service on UDP port 1234 to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor was notified on August 25, 2010.Francis Provencher of Protek Research Lab's reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-4227.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4229.title: Novell ZENworks Asset Management Directory Traversal Flaw Lets Remote Users Overwrite Files and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4229.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell ZENworks Asset Management. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted file path name to a file upload servlet to overwrite files on the target system. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor was notified on November 30, 2010.AbdulAziz Hariri of ThirdEyeTesters reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-4229.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4252.title: OpenSSL J-PAKE Validation Error Lets Remote Users Validate Without Shared Secret Key
CVE-2010-4252.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can validate without the shared secret key.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the J-PAKE implementation to successfully validate without having the shared secret.The experimental J-PAKE code is not compiled by default.The original advisory is available at:http://seb.dbzteam.org/crypto/jpake-session-key-retrieval.pdfSebastian Martini reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4252.extra: A remote user can validate without the shared secret key.

CVE-2010-4253.title: OpenOffice.org Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4253.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause files to be overwritten on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-3451, CVE-2010-3452, CVE-2010-3453, CVE-2010-3454, CVE-2010-4253, CVE-2010-4643]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The processing of RTF, Word, PNG, and TGA files are affected.A remote user can exploit a flaw in zip/jar package extraction to cause files outside the root of the destination folder to be overwritten [CVE-2010-3450].
CVE-2010-4253.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will overwrite arbitrary files on the target user's system with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2010-4261.title: Clam AntiVirus Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4261.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target application, will trigger an off-by-one memory error in 'libclamav/pe_icons.c' and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target application, will trigger an error in 'libclamav/pdf.c' and crash.Arkadiusz Miskiewicz reported one of the PDF vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-4261.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2010-4267.title: HP Linux Imaging and Printing Project (hplip) Buffer Overflow in hpmud_get_pml() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4267.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Linux Imaging and Printing Project (hplip). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted SNMP response when the target user is running certain hplip tools to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in hpmud_get_pml() in '/io/hpmud/pml.c'.Sebastian Krahmer of the SuSE Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4267.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4274.title: IBM Systems Director 'reset_diragent_keys' Unsafe File Permissions Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4274.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Systems Director. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user with 'system' group privielges can invoke the 'reset_diragent_keys' command to potentially execute code with elevated privileges.
CVE-2010-4274.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-4294.title: VMware Movie Decoder Heap Overflow in Decompression Routine Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4294.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Movie Decoder. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted video file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the decoder frame decompression routine and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4294.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-4296.title: VMware Race Conditions and Input Validation Flaw Let Local Users on the Host Operating System Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4296.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on the host operating system can exploit a race condition in the handling of temporary files by the mounting process to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2010-4295].VMware Workstation, Player, and Fusion are affected.VMware Workstation and Player running on Microsoft Windows are not affected.Dan Rosenberg reported this vulnerability.A local user on the host operating system can exploit a race condition in the loading of libraries to execute arbitrary shared object files with root privileges [CVE-2010-4296].VMware Workstation and Player running on Microsoft Windows are not affected.Martin Carpenter reported this vulnerability.A local user on the host operating system can exploit an input validation flaw in VMware Tools update to execute commands on the the target guest operating system with root privileges [CVE-2010-4297].The system is only affected if VMware Tools is not fully up-to-date.Windows-based virtual machines are not affected.Nahuel Grisolia of Bonsai Information Security, www.bonsai-sec.com, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4296.extra: A local user on the host operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-4296.title: VMware Movie Decoder Heap Overflow in Decompression Routine Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4296.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Movie Decoder. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted video file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the decoder frame decompression routine and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4296.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-4297.title: VMware Race Conditions and Input Validation Flaw Let Local Users on the Host Operating System Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4297.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on the host operating system can exploit a race condition in the handling of temporary files by the mounting process to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2010-4295].VMware Workstation, Player, and Fusion are affected.VMware Workstation and Player running on Microsoft Windows are not affected.Dan Rosenberg reported this vulnerability.A local user on the host operating system can exploit a race condition in the loading of libraries to execute arbitrary shared object files with root privileges [CVE-2010-4296].VMware Workstation and Player running on Microsoft Windows are not affected.Martin Carpenter reported this vulnerability.A local user on the host operating system can exploit an input validation flaw in VMware Tools update to execute commands on the the target guest operating system with root privileges [CVE-2010-4297].The system is only affected if VMware Tools is not fully up-to-date.Windows-based virtual machines are not affected.Nahuel Grisolia of Bonsai Information Security, www.bonsai-sec.com, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4297.extra: A local user on the host operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-4297.title: VMware Movie Decoder Heap Overflow in Decompression Routine Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4297.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Movie Decoder. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted video file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the decoder frame decompression routine and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4297.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-4299.title: Novell ZENworks Handheld Management Buffer Overflow in 'ZfHIPCND.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4299.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell ZENworks Handheld Management. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to 'ZfHIPCND.exe' on TCP port 2400 to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on August 25, 2010.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-4299.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4300.title: Wireshark Buffer Overflow in LDSS Dissector Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-4300.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted LDSS data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target service to crash.Nephi Johnson of BreakingPoint reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4300.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2010-4306.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4306.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, input validation flaw, use-after-free, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Krystian Kloskowski (h07), working with Secunia Research, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, Andrzej Dyjak of iDefense Labs, Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs (CVE-2010-4188), Aniway and Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint), an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-4306.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-4307.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Has Multiple Flaws That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4307.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Shockwave. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow, input validation flaw, use-after-free, or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Krystian Kloskowski (h07), working with Secunia Research, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, Andrzej Dyjak of iDefense Labs, Aaron Portnoy and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs (CVE-2010-4188), Aniway and Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint), an anonymous reporter (via TippingPoint), and IBM X-Force reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-4307.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-4323.title: Novell ZENworks Buffer Overflow in TFTPD Server Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4323.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell ZENworks. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the TFTPD service (novell-tftp.exe) on UDP port 69 to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target ZenWorks service.The vendor was notified on August 23, 2010.Francis Provencher for Protek Research Labs, AbdulAziz Hariri of ThirdEyeTesters, and SilentSignal reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-4323.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4324.title: Novell Identity Manager Input Validation Flaw in Approval Form Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-4324.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Identity Manager Roles Based Provisioning Module. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Approval Form does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Novell Identity Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2010-4324.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Novell Identity Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-4328.title: Novell iPrint LPD Unspecified Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4328.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell iPrint. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Francis Provencher of Protek Research Lab reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-4328.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4344.title: Exim Buffer Overfow in string_format() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4344.body: A vulnerability was reported in Exim. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send an e-mail message with a specially crafted header value to trigger a buffer overflow in string_format() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Electric Fence reported this vulnerability.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.
CVE-2010-4344.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4345.title: Exim Configuration File Capability Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4345.body: A vulnerability was reported in Exim. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user with Exim user privileges can create a specially crafted configuration file and then cause Exim to execute directives in the configuration file with root privileges.Systems built with the ALT_CONFIG_ROOT_ONLY configuration option unset (the default) are affected.
CVE-2010-4345.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.RealPlayer Enterprise is also affected.Nicolas Joly and Chaouki Bekrar of VUPEN Vulnerability Research Team, anonymous researchers, Sebastian Apelt, Andreas Schmidt, AbdulAziz Hariri, and Damian Put (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Alin Rad Pop and Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Aaron Portnoy, Zef Cekaj, and Logan Brown of TippingPoint DVLabs, Omair, iDefense Labs, and Team lollersk8erz reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2010-4393.title: RealPlayer Heap Corruption Error in 'vidplin.dll' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code

CVE-2010-4398.title: Windows Kernel Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4398.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a driver-kernel interaction error [CVE-2010-4398] or integer truncation error [CVE-2011-0045] to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.Zhengwenbin of 360safe, std_logic (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative), Guo Bojun, Wei Zhang, and Marco Giuliani of Prevx reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2010-4398.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-4496.title: TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection, and Session Hijacking Attacks
CVE-2010-4496.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands. A remote user can hijack user sessions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2010-4496].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2010-4497]. The code will originate from the site running the TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that may result in the disclosure of potentially sensitive information [CVE-2010-4498].A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks to hijack a target user's sessions [CVE-2010-4499].TIBCO ActiveCatalog versions prior to 1.0.1 are affected.
CVE-2010-4496.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote user can hijack a target user's session.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2010-4497.title: TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection, and Session Hijacking Attacks
CVE-2010-4497.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands. A remote user can hijack user sessions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2010-4496].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2010-4497]. The code will originate from the site running the TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that may result in the disclosure of potentially sensitive information [CVE-2010-4498].A remote user can conduct session fixation attacks to hijack a target user's sessions [CVE-2010-4499].TIBCO ActiveCatalog versions prior to 1.0.1 are affected.
CVE-2010-4497.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote user can hijack a target user's session.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2010-4502.title: CA Internet Security Suite Buffer Overflow in 'KmxSbx.sys'Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4502.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Internet Security. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL 0x88000080 value to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel-level privileges.'KmxSbx.sys' version 6.2.0.22 is affected.The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/15624/Nikita Tarakanov (CISS Research Team) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4502.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-4514.title: DotNetNuke Input Validation Hole in 'InstallWizard' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-4514.body: A vulnerability was reported in DotNetNuke. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The install wizard does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the DotNetNuke software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/Install/InstallWizard.aspx?__VIEWSTATE=<script>alert(1)</script> The original advisory is available at:http://www.procheckup.com/vulnerability_manager/vulnerabilities/pr10-19Richard Brain of ProCheckUp Ltd. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4514.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the DotNetNuke software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-4538.title: Wireshark Buffer Overflow in ENTTEC Dissector Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4538.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted DMX data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target service to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability resides in 'dissectors/packet-enttec.c'.non-customers crew reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4538.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2010-4539.title: Subversion SVNParentPath Collection Processing Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4539.body: A vulnerability was reported in Subversion. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.The vulnerability resides in 'mod_dav_svn/repos.c'.
CVE-2010-4539.extra: A remote user can cause the target server to crash.

CVE-2010-4556.title: SAP NetWeaver Business Client Buffer Overflow in 'sapwdpcd.dll' ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4556.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP NetWeaver Business Client. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the SapThemeRepository ActiveX control (sapwdpcd.dll) and trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The Load and LoadTheme methods are affected.The vendor was notified on September 30, 2010.Alexandr Polyakov and Alexey Sintsov from Digital Security Research Group reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2010-4556.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-4573.title: VMware ESXi Update Installer SFCB Authentication Lets Remote Users Gain Access
CVE-2010-4573.body: A vulnerability was reported in the VMware ESXi Update Installer. A remote user can gain access to the target system.When the ESXi 4.1 installer upgrades an ESXi 3.5 or ESXi 4.0 host to ESXi 4.1, the SFCB authentication may allow a remote user to login with arbitrary usernames and passwords.Systems where the SFCB configuration file '/etc/sfcb/sfcb.cfg' was modified prior to the upgrade and where the sfcbd daemon is running are affected.
CVE-2010-4573.extra: A remote user can login to the target system.

CVE-2010-4590.title: IBM Lotus Mobile Connect Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-4590.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Mobile Connect. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Connection Manager does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Lotus Mobile Connect software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2010-4590.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Lotus Mobile Connect software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-4604.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4604.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the backup-archive client to read, copy, alter, or delete files on the target system. Peter Wilhelmsen and Daniel Kalici, Kryptos Logic, reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit an access control flaw in the backup-archive client to replace system files on the target client with arbitrary content.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Space Management client to execute arbitrary commands on the target system.
CVE-2010-4604.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-4606.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2010-4606.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Tivoli Storage Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the backup-archive client to read, copy, alter, or delete files on the target system. Peter Wilhelmsen and Daniel Kalici, Kryptos Logic, reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit an access control flaw in the backup-archive client to replace system files on the target client with arbitrary content.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Space Management client to execute arbitrary commands on the target system.
CVE-2010-4606.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2010-4622.title: IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-Business Lets Remote Users Traverse the Directory
CVE-2010-4622.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-Business. A remote user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request containing certain character encodings to view files on target system that are located outside of the document directory.IBM AIX is affected.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:https://[target]/%uff0e%uff0e/%uff0e%uff0e/%uff0e%uff0e\/%uff0e%uff0e/etc/passwd
CVE-2010-4622.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2010-4643.title: OpenOffice.org Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4643.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause files to be overwritten on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2010-3451, CVE-2010-3452, CVE-2010-3453, CVE-2010-3454, CVE-2010-4253, CVE-2010-4643]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The processing of RTF, Word, PNG, and TGA files are affected.A remote user can exploit a flaw in zip/jar package extraction to cause files outside the root of the destination folder to be overwritten [CVE-2010-3450].
CVE-2010-4643.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will overwrite arbitrary files on the target user's system with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2010-4644.title: Subversion 'rev_hunt.c' Memory Consumption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4644.body: A vulnerability was reported in Subversion. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a 'blame -g' command to cause the target service to consume excessive memory and hang or crash.The vulnerability resides in 'libsvn_repos/rev_hunt.c'.
CVE-2010-4644.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2010-4670.title: Cisco ASA Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service and Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2010-4670.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security controls.A remote user can send specially crafted LAN-to-LAN (aka L2L) IPsec sessions to cause unspecified denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-4692]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCth36592 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially rafted multicast traffic to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4691]. Cisco has assignd Bug IDs CSCtg61810 and CSCtg69742 to this vulnerability.A remote user may be able to send a specially crafted HEAD request to the Mobile User Security (MUS) service to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2010-4690]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte53635 to this vulnerability.The device does not properly preserve ACL behavior after a migration [CVE-2010-4688]. A remote user can send unspecified data to bypass access restrictions. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte46460 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP calls to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4689]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte20030 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP authentication requests to trigger a memory leak and consume excessive memory on the target device [CVE-2010-4682]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtf29867 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to bypass SMTP inspection [CVE-2010-4681]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCte14901 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can view CIFS shares via WebVPN when CIFS file browing has been disabled [CVE-2010-4680]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsz80777 to this vulnerability.The device does not properly handle Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) connection failures [CVE-2010-4679]. A remote user can exhaust all available TCP sockets. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsz36816 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send data while the device is starting up to bypass access restrictions [CVE-2010-4678]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsy86769 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted request via emWeb for a document with a name that contains space characters to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4677]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsy08416 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send a high volume of IPSec traffic to cause the target device to crash [CVE-2010-4676]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsx52748 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated users can bypass Telnet access restrictions [CVE-2010-4675]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCsv40504 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted multicast traffic to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-4674]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtg63992 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a packet flood to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2010-4673]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtg06316 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted EIGRP traffic to trigger an EIGRP multicast storm [CVE-2010-4672]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtf20269 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send Router Advertisement (RA) messages via IPv6 with different source addresses to cause excessive CPU consumption on the target system or possibly cause the target device to hang [CVE-2010-4670]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCti24526 to this vulnerability.A remote user can cause an ADSM syslog outage by sending a long URL [CVE-2009-5037]. Cisco has assigned Bug IDs CSCsm11264 and CSCtb92911 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4670.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can bypass certain security controls.

CVE-2010-4701.title: Microsoft Fax Cover Page Editor Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2010-4701.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Fax Cover Page Editor. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.cov' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://retrogod.altervista.org/9sg_cov_bof.htmlAndrea Micalizzi aka rgod reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4701.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will potentially execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2010-4757.title: e107 Input Validation Hole in News Item Title Field Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-4757.body: A vulnerability was reported in e107. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the e107 software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Specially crafted news item titles are affected when displayed for review (e107_admin/newspost.php?sn) by the target administrator.A remote user can also determine the appropriate token to be used in the user add form (e107_admin/users.php?create) to conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.Justin Klein Keane reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-4757.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the e107 website system software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.

CVE-2010-4819.title: X Input Validation Flaw in ProcRenderAddGlyphs() Lets Local Users Obtain Memory Contents and Deny Service
CVE-2010-4819.body: A vulnerability was reported in X. A local user can obtain portions of server process memory. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can exploit a flaw in ProcRenderAddGlyphs() to cause the server process to leak arbitrary memory contents and potentially crash.
CVE-2010-4819.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain portions of server process memory.

CVE-2010-5084.title: e107 Input Validation Hole in News Item Title Field Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-5084.body: A vulnerability was reported in e107. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the e107 software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Specially crafted news item titles are affected when displayed for review (e107_admin/newspost.php?sn) by the target administrator.A remote user can also determine the appropriate token to be used in the user add form (e107_admin/users.php?create) to conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.Justin Klein Keane reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2010-5084.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the e107 website system software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.

CVE-2010-5192.title: Blue Coat ProxySG Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2010-5192.body: A vulnerability was reported in Blue Coat ProxySG. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The administrative interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Blue Coat ProxySG device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2010-5192.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Blue Coat ProxySG device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2010-5312.title: Oracle Database Multiple Flaws Let Remote and Local Users Access and Modify Data and Gain Elevated Privileges and Let Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2010-5312.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle Database. A remote and local user can access data on the target system. A remote user can modify data on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the OJVM component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2016-5555].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Kernel PDB component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2016-5572].A local user can exploit a flaw in the RDBMS Security component to gain elevated privileges [CVE-2016-5497].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Application Express component to partially access and partially modify data [CVE-2010-5312].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Kernel PDB component to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2016-5516].A local user can exploit a flaw in the RDBMS Programmable Interface component to access data [CVE-2016-5505].A local user can exploit a flaw in the RDBMS Security component to partially access data [CVE-2016-5498, CVE-2016-5499].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the RDBMS Security and SQL*Plus component to partially access data [CVE-2016-3562].The following researchers reported these and other Oracle product vulnerabilities:Abhishek Singh; Alejo Popovici; Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security; Amichai Shulman of Imperva, Inc.; Ariel Walter Garcia; Behzad Najjarpour Jabbari, Secunia Research at Flexera Software; bo13oy of Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative; Cezar Santos; David Litchfield of Google; Dawid Golunski; Denis Shpektorov; Devin Rosenbauer of Identity Works LLC; Felix Wilhelm; Hunter Liu of Huawei's IT Infrastructure & Security Dept, BPIT&QM; Jackson Thuraisamy of Security Compass; Jacob Baines - Tenable Network Security (via Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative); Jakub Palaczynski of ING Services Polska; John Page (hyp3rlinx); Jordan Milne; Mateusz Guzik; Matias Mevied of Onapsis; Matthias Kaiser of Code White; Michael Miller of Integrigy; Okan Basegmez of DORASEC Consulting; Pete Finnigan; Peter Moody; Rahmat Nur Fauzi; Reno Robert; Rex Dale Stevens; Sahar Sabban of Intel; Suraj Khetani of Gulf Business Machines; Sven Blumenstein of Google; Tommy DeVoss of Evolution Security; Valentin Dornauer; and Vishnu Padmakumar.
CVE-2010-5312.extra: A remote user can obtain data on the target system.A remote user can modify data on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain data on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.
